NK031(ki)007:1: // sems sde ma bu bco brgyad kyi dgongs pa ngo sprad pa'i thabs /
NK031(ki)007:2: rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bco brgyad bskur ba'i chog
NK031(ki)007:3: khrigs bla ma'i zhal gdams zhes bya ba bzhugs so
NK031(ki)007:4: // g.yung ston rdo rje dpal bzang po'i yig cha lags /
NK031(ki)007:5: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun byed rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK031(ki)007:6: thub dbang bstan pa mar 'grib tshe //
NK031(ki)007:7: las kyis tshe thung bka' don stor //
NK031(ki)007:8: bstan gnyis grub mtha' ngan pas dkrugs //
NK031(ki)007:9: gnyen pos mi non sgrub brtson zhan //
NK031(ki)007:10: de tshe de ba bzang skyong gis //
NK031(ki)007:11: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la //
NK031(ki)007:12: bskul zhing gsol ba 'di ltar btab //
NK031(ki)007:13: gsung gi mnga' bdag thams cad kyis //
NK031(ki)007:14: rtsol ba'i theg pa mthar bton nas //
NK031(ki)007:15: rtsol med theg pa mi gsung bar //
NK031(ki)007:16: thugs rje chen po yal lam ci //
NK031(ki)007:17: skal ldan gdul bya mchis pas na //
NK031(ki)007:18: lhun grub theg pa gsung du gsol //
NK031(ki)007:19: zhes bskul bas sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang /
NK031(ki)007:20: yul dang 'phrad pa'i thugs rje yis //
NK031(ki)007:21: rtsol bral theg pa bstan pa yi //
NK031(ki)007:22: dus la bab par mkhyen gzigs nas //
NK031(ki)007:23: thugs rje'i rnam sprul gsang bdag gis //
NK031(ki)007:24: lha phrug kun dga' snying po la //
NK031(ki)007:25: dus mtha'i skad cig nyid la ni //
NK031(ki)007:26: a ti rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po //
NK031(ki)007:27: klong dgu bam po nyi khri gsungs //
NK031(ki)007:28: sde gsum las ni sems kyi sde //
NK031(ki)007:30: de dag kun gyi nges pa'i don //
NK031(ki)007:31: skal ldan smin par byed pa'i thabs //
NK031(ki)007:32: bdag brtag ye shes ngos bzung dang //
NK031(ki)007:33: spyi blugs thug phrad lhug pa dang //
NK031(ki)007:34: klong rdol rang grol dong sprugs dang //
NK031(ki)007:35: ye gsal bde chen gyin 'da' dang //
NK031(ki)007:36: mi g.yo rdzogs pa ngang rang 'khrungs //
NK031(ki)007:37: btang snyoms rtse gcig lhun grub pa //
NK031(ki)007:38: re re la'ang man ngag bco brgyad do //
NK031(ki)007:39: dbang gding spyod phrin bskur thabs dpe //
NK031(ki)007:40: ngo sprad gdams ngag dgongs 'grel glu //
NK031(ki)007:41: nyams rin rig dbye them yig sgron //
NK031(ki)007:42: legs skabs grub mtha' gtad rgya'o //
NK031(ki)007:43: dbang re la'ang man ngag bco brgyad de //
NK031(ki)007:44: sum brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis //
NK031(ki)007:45: skal ldan 'bad med grol bar byed //
NK031(ki)007:46: de don lag tu blang ba ni //
NK031(ki)007:47: mkhas pa nyi shu rtsa gcig sogs //
NK031(ki)007:48: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa rnams //
NK031(ki)007:49: snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa yi //
NK031(ki)007:50: zhal gyi gdams pa'i yi ger bkod //
NK031(ki)007:51: 'dir shin tu rnal 'byor gyi theg pa'i lugs kyis
NK031(ki)007:52: skal ldan 'bad med du grol bar byed pa la
NK031(ki)007:53: / 'brel ba bzhi dang ldan pa zhig dgos par bzhed de /
NK031(ki)007:57: gdams ngag phyag bzhes dang 'brel ba /
NK031(ki)007:58: phyag bzhes bla ma brgyud pa'i byin rlabs dang 'brel ba'o //
NK031(ki)007:60: la bzla ba rgyal po'i rgyud /
NK031(ki)007:62: rang grol mngon sum du ston pa man ngag gi
NK031(ki)007:63: rgyud sde rtsa bshad dang bcas pa rnams yin la
NK031(ki)007:64: / de las kyang rgyal po'i rgyud skor /
NK031(ki)007:65: kun byed rgyal po ma bu dgu skor la sogs
NK031(ki)007:66: pa rnams kyi nang nas phyungs pa bkol ba dum
NK031(ki)007:67: bu'i rgyud dam / snying po man ngag gi rgyud /
NK031(ki)007:68: sems sde ma bu bco brgyad du grags pa 'di rnams yin no //
NK031(ki)007:69: rgyud de rnams dang 'brel ba'i dbang ni /
NK031(ki)007:70: bdag brtag pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi
NK031(ki)007:71: dbang bskur ba skyes bu snying bton pa lta bu
NK031(ki)007:72: la sogs pa rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bco brgyad
NK031(ki)007:74: dbang dang 'brel ba'i gdams ngag ni /
NK031(ki)007:75: gdengs spyod la sogs pa rnams yin no //
NK031(ki)007:76: gdams ngag dang 'brel ba'i phyag bzhes ni /
NK031(ki)007:77: 'chad par 'gyur pa'i phyag bzhes kyi yi ge ris
NK031(ki)007:78: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa'i phyag len bzhin bdag
NK031(ki)007:80: phyag bzhes 'di bla ma brgyud pa'i byin rlabs dang 'brel tshul ni /
NK031(ki)007:81: chos sku kun tu bzang po nas bdag yan chad brgyud pa ma chad cing ma nyams pa'i phyir /
NK031(ki)007:82: byin rlabs dang 'brel ba yin no //
NK031(ki)007:84: chos sku kun tu bzang po /
NK031(ki)007:85: longs sku rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas /
NK031(ki)007:86: sprul sku gsang bdag phyag rdor /
NK031(ki)007:87: yang sprul dga' rab rdo rje /
NK031(ki)007:88: mkhas pa nyi shu rtsa gcig /
NK031(ki)007:89: sgra bsgyur bee ro tsa na /
NK031(ki)007:90: rgyal mo g.yu sgra snying po /
NK031(ki)007:91: gnyags lo ye shes gzhon nu /
NK031(ki)007:92: sog po dpal gyi ye shes /
NK031(ki)007:93: gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes /
NK031(ki)007:94: gnubs chung yon tan yab sras /
NK031(ki)007:95: mkhas pa nyang shes rab mchog /
NK031(ki)007:98: zur chung shes rab grags pa /
NK031(ki)007:100: sgro phug pa sh+aakya seng ge /
NK031(ki)007:102: mkhas pa lce ston yab sras /
NK031(ki)007:106: chos rje bla skyabs rdo rje /
NK031(ki)007:107: drin can mkhas pa chen po /
NK031(ki)007:109: ma gcig drin can zur mo /
NK031(ki)007:114: bshes gnyen dkon mchog bzang po /
NK031(ki)007:115: kahthoga pa rdo rje bzang po /
NK031(ki)007:117: mkhas grub sha mi rdor rgyal /
NK031(ki)007:119: mtshungs med blo gros rgyal mtshan /
NK031(ki)007:120: zab lung pa dbang gi rgyal po /
NK031(ki)007:125: rgyal sras rin chen rnam rgyal /
NK031(ki)007:127: sgom ri pa o rgyan klong yangs /
NK031(ki)007:128: kun mkhyen gnyis pa 'jigs med gling pa /
NK031(ki)007:129: grub dbang kun bzang gzhan phan /
NK031(ki)007:131: rgyal sras gzhan phan mtha' yas /
NK031(ki)007:132: kun mkhyen gsum pa pad+ma 'od gsal mdo sngags gling pa /
NK031(ki)007:133: 'jam mgon pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug /
NK031(ki)007:134: rigs bdag bdud 'joms nam mkha'i rdo rje'i bar rim par brgyud de /
NK031(ki)007:135: byin rlabs kyi na bun ma yal /
NK031(ki)007:136: dbang dang gdams ngag gi char rgyun ma chad /
NK031(ki)007:137: gsol 'debs kyi 'brug sgra ma chag pa yin no //
NK031(ki)007:138: 'dir zur sh+aakya bshes gnyen nas bdag gi rigs bdag
NK031(ki)007:139: bar gyi brgyud rim phyogs gcig gi kha skong dz+ny+aa
NK031(ki)007:140: nas so // brgyud rim gyi rnam thar rgyas pa rgya 'gram bod 'gram gnyis las shes par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:141: de ltar 'brel ba bzhi ldan gyi sgo nas skal
NK031(ki)007:142: ldan smin par byed pa'i dbang 'di la spyi don
NK031(ki)007:148: bla ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pas slob ma'i mtshan nyid yongs su brtags te /
NK031(ki)007:149: yo byad gzhung bzhin du gsog tu bcug nas /
NK031(ki)007:150: gnas mtshan nyid dang ldan par bkra shis pa'i gza'
NK031(ki)007:151: skar la sogs pa 'dzom pa'i dus su a nu
NK031(ki)007:152: man chad kyi dbang gis smin par byas pa'am gzhan
NK031(ki)007:153: du na / sgyu 'phrul gyi bsre ba'i cho ga rgyas par bya /
NK031(ki)007:154: gnas khang dang bstun pa'i sa stegs che chung gang
NK031(ki)007:155: yang rung ba la dri bzang dang ba byung lngas
NK031(ki)007:158: de'ang dkyus thig gi cha sum cu so gnyis su phyes te /
NK031(ki)007:159: sa stegs de'i brgyad cha phyir dor ba'i zlum thig bskor /
NK031(ki)007:160: de'i dbus su tshangs thig nas phyi'i zlum thig gi
NK031(ki)007:161: bar sum cha gsum du bcal ba'i nang ma lte
NK031(ki)007:162: ba'i don du zlum thig gcig bskor /
NK031(ki)007:163: zlum thig phyi nang gnyis ka la yang pad+ma che
NK031(ki)007:164: chung dang bstun pa'i mu khyud kyi don du nang
NK031(ki)007:165: ngos su zlum thig re re bskor /
NK031(ki)007:167: pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug kha dog dmar po la
NK031(ki)007:168: mu khyud nang ma 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang
NK031(ki)007:169: / phyi rdo rje'i phreng ba dang /
NK031(ki)007:170: de'i phyi rol du shar phyogs su snying gi rtse mo'i rnam pa dang /
NK031(ki)007:171: nub phyogs su snying sgrom gyi rnam pa mtha' bskor
NK031(ki)007:172: la snying shun snying tshil dang bcas pa'i rnam pa
NK031(ki)007:173: bri / dbus kyi lte ba la a dkar po gnyis dbu shar nub tu bstan pa bris la /
NK031(ki)007:174: rtsa yi rnam pa kha dog dmar skya tshon gyis sbrel ba /
NK031(ki)007:175: pad 'dab bcu drug la a bcu drug dbu phyir bstan du bris la /
NK031(ki)007:176: rtsa'i rnam pa dmar skyas a thams cad dbus kyi lte ba la sbrel lo //
NK031(ki)007:177: de ni mtshon byed rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor yin no //
NK031(ki)007:178: des ci mtshon na snying rin po che 'bar ba'i
NK031(ki)007:179: dbus na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad yul dang
NK031(ki)007:180: bcas pa ye nas dag cing thams cad rgyu rkyen
NK031(ki)007:182: byed pa po med par lhun gyis grub pa'i kun
NK031(ki)007:183: tu bzang po bco brgyad rang chas su gnas so
NK031(ki)007:184: zhes pa'i barda'o // de nas a de rnams kyi
NK031(ki)007:185: steng du khri'u 'am many+dzi la gnas pa'i bum pa
NK031(ki)007:186: bco brgyad dkar zhal nas byung la /
NK031(ki)007:187: mchu'i 'og tu tsit+ta dmar po'i gzugs re la gnas pa'i a dkar po re bris /
NK031(ki)007:188: nang du dri bzang po bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas
NK031(ki)007:189: pa'i chus sum gnyis gang ba blugs la ngag tu
NK031(ki)007:190: a zhes brjod pas a dkar po re re 'od
NK031(ki)007:191: du zhu nas ma skyes pa'i chos nyid ma 'gags
NK031(ki)007:193: rgyu rkyen med par rang byung nas /
NK031(ki)007:194: byed pa po med par lhun gyis grub par mos pa byas la /
NK031(ki)007:195: bum pa'i mgul ras zung gis bcings shing 'bras bu
NK031(ki)007:196: dang bcas pa'i shing dug bya'i sgro dang bcas pas
NK031(ki)007:197: kha brgyan la / rdo rje'i glu gsungs pa'i rig
NK031(ki)007:198: pa 'dzin pa'i tsaka li rnams kyis kyang mtshan par
NK031(ki)007:199: kha brgyan la / bya'o // gal te dkyil 'khor
NK031(ki)007:200: chung nas bum pa mi shong na bum pa rnams
NK031(ki)007:201: kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' bskor te pad 'dab kyi
NK031(ki)007:202: a re'i thad kar bum pa re 'god do //
NK031(ki)007:203: de nas ji ltar 'byor pas dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan gyis gnas khang gzi brjid dang ldan par byas /
NK031(ki)007:204: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi don du dkyil 'khor gyi
NK031(ki)007:205: mtha' nang gi mchod pa sman raka gtor gsum dang
NK031(ki)007:206: / phyi'i mchod pa chu gsum bzhi bsnol dang bcas pas bskor bar bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:207: de nas yul lha dang gzhi bdag la sogs pa la gser skyems sam /
NK031(ki)007:208: cha gsum gyis tshim par byas la bar chad kyis
NK031(ki)007:209: mi tshugs par bya ba'i phyir phyi nang gi mtshams
NK031(ki)007:210: bcad la / bla mas kha shar bltas kyis dkyil
NK031(ki)007:211: 'khor la mngon par phyogs pas dbang gi khri la
NK031(ki)007:212: bcad la / 'dug cing / mched rnams kyang gral
NK031(ki)007:213: rim la 'khod nas tshul phyag dang gral phyag bya
NK031(ki)007:214: bcad la / 'dug cing / zhing / rgyud dag
NK031(ki)007:215: par bya ba'i phyir na raka dong sprug gi cho
NK031(ki)007:216: ga dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo byas nas ma mgon
NK031(ki)007:217: lcam dral bskang zhing bar chad mi 'byung ba'i phrin
NK031(ki)007:218: las bcol la mched lcam dang bcas pa gnyid kyi
NK031(ki)007:220: de dag ni sngon du 'gro ba'i rim pa ste sta gon gyi cho ga rdzogs so //
NK031(ki)007:221: spyi don gnyis pa dbang gi dngos gzhi ni /
NK031(ki)007:222: dbang bco brgyad po re re la zhag re re'am /
NK031(ki)007:223: nyin mtshan re re'am snga dro phyi dro srod dang gsum la dbang re re bskur ba'ang rung ste /
NK031(ki)007:224: dbang re re la'ang don chings bco brgyad kyis ston kyang /
NK031(ki)007:225: bla ma rnams phyag bzhes su mdzad tsa na don
NK031(ki)007:226: chings dgu'i bar du nor bu'i lugs su bskur nas
NK031(ki)007:227: / don chings bcu pa man chad dbang thams cad rdzogs pa'i rjes su /
NK031(ki)007:228: don chings thams cad kyi thun mong du dbang gi gtad rgya'am rgyab chos su mdzad do //
NK031(ki)007:229: de la thog mar khyung chen dang rjes su 'brel
NK031(ki)007:230: bar dbang dang po bskur ba la stod kyi don
NK031(ki)007:233: bdag brtag pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi
NK031(ki)007:234: dbang bskur ba skyes bu'i snying bton pa lta bu'o
NK031(ki)007:235: // gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:236: ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa gsal ba'i gding ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:237: gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:238: rig pa sna tshogs su 'char ba'i spyod pa snang
NK031(ki)007:239: 'gag med pas te rtsi sman sna tshogs lta bu'o
NK031(ki)007:240: // bzhi pa de lta bu'i gang zag gi rgyud la 'khyer ba'i phrin las ni /
NK031(ki)007:241: sngon du bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i
NK031(ki)007:242: don du tshul phyag nas brtsams te yi dam gang
NK031(ki)007:243: byed kyi phrin las gzhung bsrang la tshogs kyi mchod
NK031(ki)007:244: pa bya'o // de dag kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs
NK031(ki)007:245: de'ang ye shes kyi tshogs su la bzla ba'i don
NK031(ki)007:246: du mchod mkhan rnams kyis kun bzang don gyi phrin
NK031(ki)007:248: bla mas bya rtsol med pa'i phrin las kyi ngang
NK031(ki)007:249: la gnas par bya ba dang ngag tu yang brda
NK031(ki)007:252: mtshams bcad bshags pa dkyil 'khor las //
NK031(ki)007:253: phyag 'tshal mchod dang bzlas pa dang //
NK031(ki)007:254: gtor tshogs rjes kyi smon lam dgus //
NK031(ki)007:255: bya rtsol med pa'i phrin las rdzogs //
NK031(ki)007:257: de yang dang po mtshams bcad pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:259: mi rtog ye shes bgegs bsal nas //
NK031(ki)007:261: mchod mkhan rnams kyis dbyangs dang bcas pa'am med kyang rung ste /
NK031(ki)007:262: don yid la bsam zhing tshig 'di skad brjod de /
NK031(ki)007:265: rje btsun nga ni rgyal ba kun gyi yab //
NK031(ki)007:266: thams cad ngar brjod rig 'dzin yongs kyi rje //
NK031(ki)007:267: thams cad ngar 'dus rnal 'byor yongs kyi dpon //
NK031(ki)007:268: srid gsum char ltar babs kyang nga mi gsher //
NK031(ki)007:269: khams gsum chu ltar 'brub kyang nga mi 'khyer //
NK031(ki)007:270: rgyud drug me ltar 'bar yang nga mi 'tshig /
NK031(ki)007:271: stong gsum rlung ltar g.yos kyang nga mi bskyod //
NK031(ki)007:272: dug gsum mun ltar 'thibs kyang nga mi 'thoms //
NK031(ki)007:273: ye shes nyi ma shar yang gsal rgyu med //
NK031(ki)007:274: ma rig mun pa byung yang gnag rgyu med //
NK031(ki)007:275: skye shi ris su bcad kyang 'chi rgyu med //
NK031(ki)007:276: nyon mongs dug gsum gnas kyang spang rgyu med //
NK031(ki)007:277: dngos grub rnam gsum yin yang chags rgyu med //
NK031(ki)007:278: chos sku 'gyur med grub kyang btsal pa med //
NK031(ki)007:279: rang byung nyid du gnas pas rag mi lus //
NK031(ki)007:280: snying po lhun gyis grub pas rten mi 'cha' //
NK031(ki)007:281: mtshams kyi rgyal po mi rtog ye gnas pas //
NK031(ki)007:282: bgegs kyi rgyal po rtog pa ma spangs bcom //
NK031(ki)007:283: ma h+aa shu nya t+aa dz+ny+aa na +aah zhes brjod
NK031(ki)007:284: cing de dag gi don bla mas brda bkrol ba
NK031(ki)007:285: ni / bgegs la sogs pa'i bar chad thams cad
NK031(ki)007:286: rgyu rkyen med par rang byung byed pa po med
NK031(ki)007:287: pas lhun grub tu thag bcad la /
NK031(ki)007:288: bar chad thams cad rang byung rang zhi rang brlag
NK031(ki)007:289: tu bsams la de'i ngang la bya rtsol med par
NK031(ki)007:290: gnas par bya'o // zhes brjod do //
NK031(ki)007:291: gnyis pa bshags pa bya ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:293: rnam rtog gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur te //
NK031(ki)007:294: zhes pas mchod mkhan rnams kyis don yid la bsams shing tshig 'di skad brjod do //
NK031(ki)007:296: chos kyi dbyings nyid spros pa med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:297: gzung 'dzin gnyis su lta ba thang re chad //
NK031(ki)007:298: dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:299: spros med bde chen klong du bshags par bagyi'o //
NK031(ki)007:300: kun tu bzang po bzang ngan med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:301: gtsang rme gnyis su lta ba thang che chad //
NK031(ki)007:302: bzang ngan gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:303: kun bzang bde chen klong du bshags par bgyi //
NK031(ki)007:304: mnyam pa nyid la che chung med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:305: sangs rgyas sems can lta ba thang re chad //
NK031(ki)007:306: che chung gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:307: mnyam nyid bde chen klong du bshags par bgyi //
NK031(ki)007:308: byang chub sems la skye shi med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:309: 'di dang phyi mar lta ba thang re chad //
NK031(ki)007:310: skye shi gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:311: 'chi med g.yung drung klong du bshags par bgyi //
NK031(ki)007:312: thig le chen po grwa zur med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:313: gzugs dang rdzas su lta ba thang re chad //
NK031(ki)007:314: grwa zur gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:315: kun nas zlum pa'i thig le chen por bshags //
NK031(ki)007:316: dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang nyid las //
NK031(ki)007:317: thog ma tha mar lta ba thang re chad //
NK031(ki)007:318: 'pho 'gyur gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:319: dus gsum 'gyur med klong du bshags par bagyi'o //
NK031(ki)007:320: rang byung ye shes rtsol ba med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:321: rgyu 'bras gnyis su lta ba thang re chad //
NK031(ki)007:322: rtsol sgrub gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:323: rang byung rtsol med ngang du bshags par bagyi'o //
NK031(ki)007:324: rig pa ye shes gzung 'dzin med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:325: rtag chad gnyis su lta ba thang re chad //
NK031(ki)007:326: gzung 'dzin gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:327: rig pa ye shes klong du bshags par bgyi //
NK031(ki)007:328: chos dbyings rnam dag spros pa med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:329: zug rngu gnyis su lta ba thang re chad //
NK031(ki)007:330: mtha' dbus gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:331: chos dbyings rnam dag klong du bshags par bagyi'o //
NK031(ki)007:332: gzhal yas khang la yangs dog med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:333: phyi dang nang du lta ba thang re chad //
NK031(ki)007:334: yangs dog gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:335: gzhal yas yangs dog med pa'i klong du bshags par bagyi'o //
NK031(ki)007:336: yum gyi mkha' la mtho dman med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:337: steng dang 'og tu lta ba thang re chad //
NK031(ki)007:338: mtho dman gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:339: b+ha ga mtho dman med pa'i klong du bshags par bagyi'o //
NK031(ki)007:340: chos kyi sku la gnyis su med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:341: phyi nang gnyis su lta ba thang re chad //
NK031(ki)007:342: snod bcud gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK031(ki)007:343: chos sku 'gyur med klong du bshags par bagyi'o //
NK031(ki)007:344: ma rig rmongs pa'i blo 'di snying re rje //
NK031(ki)007:345: gzugs med chos la dngos po mtshan mar bzung //
NK031(ki)007:346: gang zag 'khrul pa'i sems 'di yongs re sdug /
NK031(ki)007:347: skye med chos la nga dang bdag tu bzung //
NK031(ki)007:348: snang srid sgyu ma yin par ma shes pas //
NK031(ki)007:349: zang zing nor la sems kyi chags pa skyes //
NK031(ki)007:350: 'khor ba rang bzhin med par ma shes pas //
NK031(ki)007:351: gnyen bshes 'khrul pa'i grogs la rtag par bzung //
NK031(ki)007:352: mi shes skye bo'i sems 'di yongs su gol //
NK031(ki)007:353: bden pa'i don bor mi dge'i las la brtson //
NK031(ki)007:354: ston pa'i bka' bor mi chos g.yeng bas bslus //
NK031(ki)007:355: rang rig don med g.yeng ba'i las la brtson //
NK031(ki)007:356: 'di 'dra'i don med sems can snying re rje //
NK031(ki)007:357: dbye 'bri med pa'i klong du bshags par bagyi'o //
NK031(ki)007:358: zhes brjod cing de dag gi don bla mas brda bkrol zhiing 'di skad brjod /
NK031(ki)007:359: gal te sku yi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK031(ki)007:360: chos nyid skye ba med pa'i ngang du bshags //
NK031(ki)007:361: gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK031(ki)007:362: chos nyid brjod du med pa'i ngang du bshags //
NK031(ki)007:363: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK031(ki)007:364: chos nyid dran rtog med pa'i ngang du bshags //
NK031(ki)007:365: gsang ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK031(ki)007:366: gsang ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang du bshags //
NK031(ki)007:367: rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK031(ki)007:368: rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi ngang du bshags //
NK031(ki)007:369: yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK031(ki)007:370: chos nyid gnyis su med pa'i ngang du bshags //
NK031(ki)007:371: chos spyi'i dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK031(ki)007:372: chos nyid lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang du bshags //
NK031(ki)007:373: chos khyad par gyi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK031(ki)007:374: mtshan ma chos can lhun grub kyi ngang du bshags //
NK031(ki)007:375: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas da lta yan
NK031(ki)007:376: chod du mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga sogs
NK031(ki)007:377: byas pa kun / rang byung ye shes rtog pa med pa'i ngang du bshags par bagyi'o //
NK031(ki)007:379: gsum pa dkyil 'khor las su bya ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:380: mtshon byed dpe'i dkyil 'khor rdul tshon gyis bris pa 'di yin la /
NK031(ki)007:381: mtshon bya don gyi dkyil 'khor tsit+ta rin po che'i gzhal yas na /
NK031(ki)007:382: rtsa pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i dkyil lam lte
NK031(ki)007:383: ba la rgyu rkyen med par rang byung gi kun
NK031(ki)007:385: byed pa po med par lhun grub kyi kun tu
NK031(ki)007:386: bzang mo gnyis gdod nas ma skyes pa'i chos nyid
NK031(ki)007:387: yi ge a'i rnam par gnas pa ni dkyil yin
NK031(ki)007:388: la / pad 'dab bcu drug la rnam shes tshogs
NK031(ki)007:389: brgyad yul dang bcas pa gdod nas dag pa'i kun
NK031(ki)007:390: tu bzang po bcu drug ni 'khor yin no //
NK031(ki)007:391: de yang 'khor gyi kun tu bzang po zhes 'khor ba ye gdal gyi ngos nas smos la /
NK031(ki)007:392: dkyil ni khams gsum dong sprugs kyi rang bzhin te /
NK031(ki)007:393: don 'khor 'das kyi chos la blang dor med pa
NK031(ki)007:394: rang byung gi ye shes thig le nyag gcig tu
NK031(ki)007:395: gnas pa'o // de ltar gnas pa la gnas pa ltar bsgom pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:396: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis lha bskyed cing dbang bskur byin rlabs la sogs pa bya ba'i tshul ni /
NK031(ki)007:398: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
NK031(ki)007:400: mchod mkhan rnams kyis don yid la bsam zhing tshig 'di skad brjod do //
NK031(ki)007:402: rang gi sems nyid gdod nas ma dag na //
NK031(ki)007:403: 'phral du phyogs tsam bsgom pas dag mi 'gyur //
NK031(ki)007:404: chos nyid ma bcos ye nas yin shes na //
NK031(ki)007:405: de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin ma bsgom gsal //
NK031(ki)007:406: thabs kyi rtsa bar snying rje ma shar na //
NK031(ki)007:407: 'phral gyi phyogs tsam yongs la khyab mi 'gyur //
NK031(ki)007:408: brdal ba chen po blo yis phyir khyab na //
NK031(ki)007:409: kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin ma bsgom gsal //
NK031(ki)007:410: rgyud nyid dag pa'i don nyid ma shes na //
NK031(ki)007:411: 'phral gyi dmigs pas rang rig gsal mi 'gyur //
NK031(ki)007:412: ye nas yin par rang rig gsal rtogs na //
NK031(ki)007:413: rgyu yi ting 'dzin de yang ma bsgom gsal //
NK031(ki)007:414: rang rig rtsal gyis yongs la ma brdal na //
NK031(ki)007:416: skad cig tsam la rang byung nyi shar na //
NK031(ki)007:417: yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin ma bsgom gsal //
NK031(ki)007:418: gnyis med yum chen b+ha ga ma rtogs na //
NK031(ki)007:419: 'phral du yum mchog bskyed pas sku mi rdzogs //
NK031(ki)007:420: shes rab pha rol phyin par dbyer med pas //
NK031(ki)007:421: snying rje yum mchog thabs dang shes rab rdzogs //
NK031(ki)007:422: sems kyi dbang phyug 'dod dgur ma shes na //
NK031(ki)007:423: 'phral du ye shes lnga yi dbang mi chags //
NK031(ki)007:424: kun gzhi'i rtsa ba phyogs bcur dbang bsgyur bas //
NK031(ki)007:425: ye 'byams chen po'i dbang mchog ma bskur rdzogs //
NK031(ki)007:426: dgongs pa'i byin rlabs thig ler ma bslab na //
NK031(ki)007:427: 'phral gyi dgongs pas sku gsung thugs mi rlobs //
NK031(ki)007:428: rang byung bde ba'i khams gsum byin brlabs pas //
NK031(ki)007:429: sku gsum byin rlabs cho 'phrul rang bzhin tshangs //
NK031(ki)007:431: bzhi pa dam tshig dang ye shes kyi kun tu
NK031(ki)007:432: bzang po ye nas g.yo ba med pa la phyag
NK031(ki)007:433: 'tshal ba ni / pany+tsa kra ma las /
NK031(ki)007:434: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang //
NK031(ki)007:435: ji ltar mar la mar bzhag bzhin //
NK031(ki)007:436: rang gis rang gi ye shes gang //
NK031(ki)007:438: zhes pa'i don dran par byas la /
NK031(ki)007:439: bya rtsol med pa'i phyag 'tshal ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:440: snang med stong med ngos bzung med la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK031(ki)007:441: dran med rig med 'gyur ba med la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK031(ki)007:442: byar med zhen med 'dzin pa med la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK031(ki)007:443: skye med lhun grub chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK031(ki)007:445: lnga pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha de rnams la mchod pa 'bul ba'i tshul ni /
NK031(ki)007:447: bla ma mchod dang bstod pa la //
NK031(ki)007:448: de bzhin bsod nams thams cad la //
NK031(ki)007:449: ma chags mi g.yo'i stobs med na //
NK031(ki)007:451: zhes pas mchod mkhan rnams kyi don yid la bsam zhing 'di skad brjod do //
NK031(ki)007:452: yid kyi mchod pas stong gsum ma khyab na //
NK031(ki)007:453: 'phral du phul bas rgyal ba mnyes mi 'gyur //
NK031(ki)007:454: yongs su khyab pas mnyes pa rgyun med na //
NK031(ki)007:455: mchod pa'i cho 'phrul don du ma bsgom tshangs //
NK031(ki)007:456: zhes pa'i don bla mas brda bkrol te /
NK031(ki)007:457: bya rtsol med pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:458: spyir 'dod yon lnga'i mchod pa dang /
NK031(ki)007:459: khyad par phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa gnyis las /
NK031(ki)007:461: gzugs snang ba dngos med kyii mchod pa /
NK031(ki)007:462: sgra grags pa gzugs med kyi mchod pa /
NK031(ki)007:463: dri tshor ba dmigs med kyi mchod pa /
NK031(ki)007:464: re myong ba tshor med kyi mchod pa /
NK031(ki)007:465: reg dran pa 'dzin med kyi mchod pa /
NK031(ki)007:466: chos skye med blo 'das kyi mchod pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:467: de dag kyang khyad par phyi nang gsang gsum du bsdus nas mchod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:468: phyi gzugs sogs kyi snang ba dngos med kyis mchod /
NK031(ki)007:469: nang rnam shes kyi rig pa 'gyur med kyis mchod /
NK031(ki)007:470: gsang ba skye med kyi don blo 'das kyi mchod pas mchod do //
NK031(ki)007:471: drug pa bzlas pa bya ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:473: mi gsung mnyam bzhag sngags tshig go //
NK031(ki)007:474: zhes pas sngags kyi bzla tshul ni /
NK031(ki)007:475: mchod mkhan rnams kyis don yid la bsam bzhin 'di skad do //
NK031(ki)007:477: dgongs pa yid kyi ting 'dzin mi gsal na //
NK031(ki)007:478: 'phral gyi 'phro 'dus rig pa'i lha mi gsal //
NK031(ki)007:479: chos nyid rang gsal rig pa'i gting go na //
NK031(ki)007:480: ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul ma bsgom gsal //
NK031(ki)007:481: don gyi bsnyen pa kho nar ma shes na //
NK031(ki)007:482: 'phral du mtshan mar brjod pas 'grub pa med //
NK031(ki)007:483: yid kyis bzlas brjod dus dang rgyun chad med //
NK031(ki)007:484: rnal 'byor bsnyen pa'i cho ga yang dag rdzogs //
NK031(ki)007:486: bdag gi phung po khams dang skye mched rnams //
NK031(ki)007:487: chags med mchod pa'i sprin du rab sprul nas //
NK031(ki)007:488: chags pa med pa'i tshul du 'bul lags na //
NK031(ki)007:489: bcom ldan spyi dpal thugs rjes bzhes su gsol //
NK031(ki)007:490: sangs rgyas khyed kyi sku mchog ci 'dra ba //
NK031(ki)007:491: nam mkha'i dbyings la cir yang snang ba'i sku //
NK031(ki)007:492: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med chos kyi sku //
NK031(ki)007:493: 'dus byas 'dus ma byas pa thabs kyi sku //
NK031(ki)007:494: sku mchog kun bzang sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK031(ki)007:495: sangs rgyas khyed kyi gsung mchog ci 'dra ba //
NK031(ki)007:496: sgra snang brjod med don las ma g.yos kyang //
NK031(ki)007:497: thugs rjes 'dul phyir gsung mchog cir yang sgrog /
NK031(ki)007:498: brjod med gsung mchog shes rab pha rol phyin //
NK031(ki)007:499: gsung mchog kun bzang gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK031(ki)007:500: sangs rgyas khyed kyi thugs ni ci 'dra ba //
NK031(ki)007:501: rnam rtog mi mnga' ci yang sa ler mkhyen //
NK031(ki)007:502: ye shes mkhyen ldan thams cad 'dus ma byas //
NK031(ki)007:503: dran byed rig pa'i rgyal po yongs su shar //
NK031(ki)007:504: thugs mchog kun bzang thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK031(ki)007:505: sangs rgyas khyed kyi yon tan ci 'dra ba //
NK031(ki)007:506: che ba'i yon tan med las cir yang snang //
NK031(ki)007:507: snang tsam nyid las thig le'i ngang du 'du //
NK031(ki)007:508: lhun rdzogs mthar phyin rgyal ba'i yon tan sku //
NK031(ki)007:509: yon tan kun bzang lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK031(ki)007:510: sangs rgyas khyed kyi phrin las ci 'dra ba //
NK031(ki)007:511: thabs kyi phrin las 'gro ba yongs la khyab //
NK031(ki)007:512: skye 'gro mang po thar pa'i lam mchog 'god //
NK031(ki)007:513: thabs mkhas mthar phyin rgyal ba'i phrin las sku //
NK031(ki)007:514: phrin las kun tu bzang la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK031(ki)007:515: ces brjod pas bsnyen cing bstod /
NK031(ki)007:517: bya rtsol med pa'i bsnyen pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:518: phyi snang srid gzhir bzhengs su bzlas /
NK031(ki)007:519: nang sgo lnga gsal la rtog med du bzlas /
NK031(ki)007:520: gsang ba skye med lhun grub tu bzlas te mthar thug gi bzlas pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:521: bdun pa gtor ma btang ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:523: mi gzung gtong bas gtor ma yin //
NK031(ki)007:524: bya ba med pa'i las rnams te //
NK031(ki)007:527: gzugs snang rab 'bring tha ma thams cad kun //
NK031(ki)007:528: sku mchog mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor rdzogs //
NK031(ki)007:529: sgra grags rab 'bring tha ma thams cad kun //
NK031(ki)007:530: gsung mchog mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor rdzogs //
NK031(ki)007:531: dran rtog rab 'bring tha ma thams cad kun //
NK031(ki)007:532: thugs mchog mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor rdzogs //
NK031(ki)007:533: sems nyid ma shes don nyid ma shes na //
NK031(ki)007:534: ji ltar brtags pa sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur //
NK031(ki)007:535: lta ba kun tu bzang la mthol bshags nas //
NK031(ki)007:536: rnam rtog gtor ma'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK031(ki)007:537: sems nyid ma yengs don nyid ma shes na //
NK031(ki)007:538: ji ltar bsgoms pas sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur //
NK031(ki)007:539: ting 'dzin kun tu bzang la mthol bshags nas //
NK031(ki)007:540: rnam rtog gtor ma'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK031(ki)007:541: rang byung lhun gyi grub par ma shes na //
NK031(ki)007:542: ji ltar btsal bas sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur //
NK031(ki)007:543: phrin las kun tu bzang la mthol bshags nas //
NK031(ki)007:544: srog dbugs gtor ma'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK031(ki)007:545: phung po rgyal ba'i sku ru ma shes na //
NK031(ki)007:546: ji ltar bskyed pas sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur //
NK031(ki)007:547: rang bzhin kun tu bzang la mthol bshags nas //
NK031(ki)007:548: rang byung gtor ma'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK031(ki)007:549: gzungs ma shes rab nyid du ma shes na //
NK031(ki)007:550: ji ltar spyad pas sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur //
NK031(ki)007:551: dam tshig kun tu bzang la mthol bshags nas //
NK031(ki)007:552: thig le gtor ma'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK031(ki)007:553: rang byung gdod nas dag par ma shes na //
NK031(ki)007:554: ji ltar sbyangs pas sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur //
NK031(ki)007:555: rnam dag kun tu bzang la mthol bshags nas //
NK031(ki)007:556: sha khrag gtor ma'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK031(ki)007:557: longs spyod sgyu ma yin par ma shes na //
NK031(ki)007:558: ji ltar bsags pas sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur //
NK031(ki)007:559: spyod pa kun tu bzang la mthol bshags nas //
NK031(ki)007:560: yo byad gtor ma'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK031(ki)007:561: phyi nang snod bcud gtor mar bsdus nas ni //
NK031(ki)007:562: thugs rje chen po'i gtor mar rab sprul te //
NK031(ki)007:563: ye shes rol pa'i gtor mar 'bul lags kyis //
NK031(ki)007:564: chos nyid dbyings kyi gtor mar bzhes su gsol //
NK031(ki)007:565: sh+r+ai b+ha dra +aah zhes brjod cing /
NK031(ki)007:566: bya rtsol med pa'i gtor ma ni /
NK031(ki)007:568: snang srid 'dzin pa med pa phyi'i gtor ma /
NK031(ki)007:569: sgo lnga gsal la rtog pa med pa nang gi gtor ma /
NK031(ki)007:570: skye med mthar thug gi don gsang ba'i gtor ma /
NK031(ki)007:571: kun tu bzang po bco brgyad la gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis dbul bar bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:572: brgyad pa tshogs kyi mchod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:574: tshogs kyi rgyan rnams bkram pa yang //
NK031(ki)007:575: rang bzhin gnas pas 'grib pa med //
NK031(ki)007:576: lhun gyis gnas pas mi bsngo ste //
NK031(ki)007:577: gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi yin //
NK031(ki)007:578: 'du byed bcu gnyis khyad par du //
NK031(ki)007:579: lhag pa'i bsam pas gzung du med //
NK031(ki)007:580: ces pas bya rtsol med pa'i tshogs kyi mchod pa bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:581: de yang theg pa chen po 'og ma pa'i zhi khro'i lha tshogs rab 'byams la /
NK031(ki)007:582: rdzas sha zan chang la sogs pa bza' dang btung
NK031(ki)007:583: ba'i bye brag mang po ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dod
NK031(ki)007:584: yon gyi lha mor byin gyis brlabs nas phul ba
NK031(ki)007:586: de bas kyang a ti'i theg pa 'dir rang bzhin
NK031(ki)007:587: gyis kun tu bzang po bco brgyad rgyu rkyen med
NK031(ki)007:588: par rang byung byed pa med par lhun gyis grub
NK031(ki)007:589: pa ste / rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad yul
NK031(ki)007:590: dang bcas pa rang bzhin gyis snang bar dag pa
NK031(ki)007:591: pa ste / de la / mchod rdzas snang srid
NK031(ki)007:592: 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad blang dor
NK031(ki)007:593: med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas ngos bzung med pa
NK031(ki)007:594: pa ste / de la / la / snang srid ngos bzung med pa ste /
NK031(ki)007:595: blo ngos bzung med par phul nas yid ngos bzung
NK031(ki)007:596: med par gnas na tshogs gnyis rang rdzogs su rdzogs
NK031(ki)007:597: so // nam mkha'i mtha' ltar kun tu thug pa med //
NK031(ki)007:598: chos sku 'gyur ba med pa'i klong na bzhugs //
NK031(ki)007:599: ma bcos thig le dur khrod gcig tu 'khyil //
NK031(ki)007:600: mi skye mi 'gag klong du phrin las rdzogs //
NK031(ki)007:602: mdor na phyi bskyed pa'i rim pa yi dam gang yin gyi phrin las /
NK031(ki)007:603: nang rdzogs pa'i rim pa kun bzang don gyi phrin las /
NK031(ki)007:604: don bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi tha snyad las 'das pas
NK031(ki)007:605: bya rtsol med pa'i phrin las gsum gzhung bsrang ba
NK031(ki)007:606: ni / rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bco brgyad po thams cad la sbyar ro //
NK031(ki)007:607: dgu pa smon lam gdab pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:608: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bum chus dbang bskur ba'i dus su brjod par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:609: lnga pa bdag brtag pa'i man ngag gi rim pa rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:610: tshogs kyi mchod pa'i rjes de nyid du bla ma
NK031(ki)007:611: dang slob ma gnyis ka'i lus gnad rnam snang gi
NK031(ki)007:612: chos bdun bcas la rlung ro lan gsum 'bud /
NK031(ki)007:614: sems gnad 'di ltar bsgom par bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:615: dpon slob gnyis ka'i tsit+ta rin po che 'bar ba'i
NK031(ki)007:616: gzhal yas su pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i lte
NK031(ki)007:617: ba la a dkar po zhal sprod dang /
NK031(ki)007:618: 'dab ma bcu drug la a dkar po bcu drug bsgom par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:619: de nas bla ma'i thugs la gnas pa'i pad+ma'i lte ba'i a rgyab ma 'od du zhu nas /
NK031(ki)007:620: 'od de sog mda' bzhin du dkar nar gyis song /
NK031(ki)007:621: mtshon dpe rdul tshon gyi pad+ma'i lte ba'i a rgyab
NK031(ki)007:622: ma la phog pas de yang 'od du dkar mer
NK031(ki)007:623: gyis zhu / de las kyang 'od dkar nar gyis
NK031(ki)007:624: 'phros nas steng gi bum pa'i a la phog pas
NK031(ki)007:625: de yang 'od du dkar mer gyis zhu nas 'od
NK031(ki)007:626: de slob ma'i snying ga pad+ma'i lte ba'i a rgyab
NK031(ki)007:627: ma la phog pas 'khor ba'i bag chags dang rnam
NK031(ki)007:628: par rtog pa thams cad sbyangs nas sems nyid dag
NK031(ki)007:629: pa'i ngo bo a dkar po de la shes pa
NK031(ki)007:630: ma yengs par gtad la bsgom du gzhug cing /
NK031(ki)007:631: bla mas rdul tshon gyi pad+ma'i lte ba la gnas
NK031(ki)007:632: pa'i a rgyab ma'i steng gi bum pa blangs la
NK031(ki)007:633: / dbyangs dang bcas pa'am med kyang rung ste /
NK031(ki)007:634: gong gi phrin las kyi rjes kyi smon lam btab ste /
NK031(ki)007:635: chos nyid dngos po med pa'i ye stong 'di //
NK031(ki)007:636: lta ba 'di dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /
NK031(ki)007:637: chos nyid nyams myong med pa'i bde stong 'di //
NK031(ki)007:638: sgom pa 'di dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /
NK031(ki)007:639: sems nyid 'chos pa med pa'i rang stong 'di //
NK031(ki)007:640: spyod pa 'di dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /
NK031(ki)007:641: chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i ye stong 'di //
NK031(ki)007:643: ji ltar smon pa'i 'bras bu 'grub par gyur cig /
NK031(ki)007:644: smon lam gyi mthu btsan par gyur cig /
NK031(ki)007:645: de kho na nyid kyi don la gnas par gyur cig /
NK031(ki)007:646: ces brjod cing bla mas bum pa slob ma'i mgo la bzhag /
NK031(ki)007:648: bum chu 'thung ba dang khrus byed du bcug la /
NK031(ki)007:649: dbang brtan par su pra tish+thasa me tog 'thor /
NK031(ki)007:651: mchod mkhan rnams kyis spos dang rol mo sbyar ro //
NK031(ki)007:653: slob ma rnams rang rang gi sngar bsgoms pa'i a la shes pa gtad la /
NK031(ki)007:654: a de yang 'od dkar po gsal la 'tsher ba'i
NK031(ki)007:655: ngang la gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par
NK031(ki)007:656: bya'o // drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:657: skyes bu snying bton pa lta bu zhes pas /
NK031(ki)007:658: bdag brtag pa'i man ngag gi rig pa rtsal gyi
NK031(ki)007:659: dbang thob pa'i stobs kyis sems rnam par rtog pa
NK031(ki)007:660: thams cad dang bral bas mtshon pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:661: bdun pa sbubs mchu'i gdams ngag gis ngo sprad pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:662: gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i slob ma
NK031(ki)007:663: so so'i rna bar rin po che'am shing la sogs
NK031(ki)007:665: bla mas gzhan gyis ma thos par /
NK031(ki)007:666: gser gyi khyung gshog ces pa'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:667: gsal la mi g.yo thal byung ba'o //
NK031(ki)007:669: brgyad pa gdams ngag gi dgongs 'grel bshad pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:670: sngar sbubs mchu'i man ngag gi dbang don ngo sprad
NK031(ki)007:671: pas slob ma rnams la thun mong du bshad par
NK031(ki)007:672: bya ste / des dbang kun la 'agre'o //
NK031(ki)007:674: thams cad ma yengs par yid la zungs shig /
NK031(ki)007:675: rig pa byang chub kyi sems de yang de la bdag ces bya ba yiin la /
NK031(ki)007:676: de'i mtshan nyid ma bcos pa'i don khong du chud
NK031(ki)007:677: pa la sems kyi de kho na nyid rtogs pa
NK031(ki)007:678: zhes bya'o // chos de nyid chos thams cad kyi bcud de dper na skyes bu'i snying lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:679: de ltar rtogs pa de kho na las dus gsum
NK031(ki)007:680: du ma g.yos par gnas pa la bdag brtags pa'i
NK031(ki)007:682: gsal la mi g.yo ba chen por gnas so //
NK031(ki)007:683: thal byung ba zhes bya ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:684: bying rgod yan par bzhag pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:685: ci'i phyir bzhag ce na thams cad chos nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir mnyam pa'i gtan tshig go //
NK031(ki)007:686: de'i phyir rig pa'i ye shes chen po nyid de ltar shar bas re dogs ka nas dag pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:687: de yang drang srong b+ha shis /
NK031(ki)007:688: sems ni ci la yang mi rtog pa //
NK031(ki)007:689: ma bcos de nyid rnal mar zhog /
NK031(ki)007:691: dgu pa rig 'dzin dgongs nyams kyi glus bskul ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:692: khyung chen gyi dgongs pa chos nyid klong rdol glu yi bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:693: tsan dan gyi nags tshal du nam gyi gung la /
NK031(ki)007:694: rgyal po da he na te lo 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:696: 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid ni //
NK031(ki)007:697: kun gzhi ma bcos byang chub sems //
NK031(ki)007:699: snang ba'i gzugs med byang chub sems //
NK031(ki)007:700: ci la mi spyod rtog pas mi bzung zhing //
NK031(ki)007:701: sems nyid rang bzhin bsam med mkha' 'dra ba //
NK031(ki)007:702: ma yengs ma bslad bcos pa med par bzhag /
NK031(ki)007:703: sgom du med pa'i chos dbyings chen po la //
NK031(ki)007:704: bsam du med pa'i rig pa ma yengs zhog /
NK031(ki)007:705: de la bsgom rgyu rdul tsam med par 'khums //
NK031(ki)007:706: skye ba brgyud nas rgyal por bdag skyes te //
NK031(ki)007:707: do ha de blangs nga rgyal bcag pa las //
NK031(ki)007:708: sngon chad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing //
NK031(ki)007:709: sems dang chos su 'dres pa'i 'phro blangs zhing //
NK031(ki)007:710: sgyu ma'i phung po da lta bsnyil ba'i phyir //
NK031(ki)007:711: kun bzang thugs kyi 'od zer bdag la shar //
NK031(ki)007:712: g+hi ta ma ko la sa a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:713: rig pa'i khu byug dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang gnyis pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:714: dang po ye shes ngos bzung ba'i man ngag gis
NK031(ki)007:715: rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba rus sbal mkhar
NK031(ki)007:716: gzhong du bcug pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:717: gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:718: rig pa rang shar ba'i sangs rgyas dang sems can
NK031(ki)007:719: gcig tu rtogs pa'i gding 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
NK031(ki)007:720: po dmus long mig phye ba lta bu thob bo
NK031(ki)007:721: // gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:722: bcos pa med pa'i spyod pa ci yang mi btsal ba ste /
NK031(ki)007:723: rgyal pos rgyal sa bzung ba lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:724: bzhi pa gang zag gi rgyud la 'khyer ba'i phrin las ni /
NK031(ki)007:725: dbang bco brgyad po thams cad mthun no //
NK031(ki)007:726: lnga pa ye shes lnga ngos bzung ba'i man ngag
NK031(ki)007:727: gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni
NK031(ki)007:728: / lus rnam snang gi chos bdun bcas la rlung ro bus la 'jam rlung bzung /
NK031(ki)007:729: bla ma dang slob ma rnams kyi tsit+ta rin po
NK031(ki)007:730: che'i gzhal yas khang na gnas pa'i pad+ma'i lte ba'i
NK031(ki)007:731: a mdun ma skya mer gyis 'od du zhu nas
NK031(ki)007:732: 'od de sog mda' bzhin du dkar nar gyis rdul
NK031(ki)007:733: tshon gyi pad+ma'i lte ba'i a mdun ma la phog
NK031(ki)007:734: pas de'ang 'od du dkar mer gyis zhu /
NK031(ki)007:735: de la yang 'od dkar nar gyis 'phros nas steng
NK031(ki)007:736: gi bum pa'i a la phog pas de yang 'od
NK031(ki)007:737: du dkar mer gyis zhu nas /
NK031(ki)007:738: de las kyang 'od dkar nar gyis 'phros nas slob
NK031(ki)007:739: ma'i snying gi pad+ma'i lte ba'i a mdun ma la
NK031(ki)007:740: phog pas a de shin tu dkar ba rang bzhin
NK031(ki)007:742: lte ba'i a mdun rgyab gnyis gcig gi 'od gcig
NK031(ki)007:743: la phog pas 'od shin tu gsal bar gyur te
NK031(ki)007:744: / snying gi nang 'od kyis khengs nas bum nang gi mar me lta bu sgom du gzhug cing /
NK031(ki)007:745: bla mas pad+ma'i lte ba la gnas pa'i a mdun
NK031(ki)007:746: ma'i steng gi bum pa blangs la dbang bskur zhing
NK031(ki)007:748: khrus la sogs pa dbang snga ma bzhin bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:750: slob ma rnams kyis rang rang gi sngar bsgoms pa
NK031(ki)007:751: bzhin snying 'od kyis gsal bar gang ba la shes
NK031(ki)007:752: pa gtad pas gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas
NK031(ki)007:753: par bya'o // drug pa dbang gi dpe ni rus
NK031(ki)007:754: sbal mkhar gzhong du bcug pa lta bu zhes pas
NK031(ki)007:755: ye shes ngos bzung ba'i man ngag gis rig pa
NK031(ki)007:756: rtsal gyi dbang thob pa'i stobs kyis sems zin pa'i
NK031(ki)007:757: rtags su lus g.yo ba dang bral ba mtshon pa'o
NK031(ki)007:758: par bya'o // // bdun pa sbubs mchu'i ngo sprad pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:759: slob ma'i rna bar sbubs mchu btsugs la 'di skad brjod do //
NK031(ki)007:760: bum pa khung gtor zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:761: ye shes ma btsal yan par zhog /
NK031(ki)007:762: ces tshig phyi ma gcig pu lan gsum brjod do //
NK031(ki)007:763: brgyad pa gdams ngag gi dgongs 'grel ni /
NK031(ki)007:764: chos thams cad ye shes su gsal bas thams cad ye shes su ngos zin par byas la /
NK031(ki)007:765: de la ma btsal bar nyams gsum gyis gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:766: de nyid kho na rus sbal mkhar gzhong du bzhag pa mi g.yo bar gnas pa dang 'dra'o //
NK031(ki)007:767: yan par bzhag ces bya ba ni bying rgod mi bcos par bzhag par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:768: 'o na gol ba dang khyad ci yod ce na
NK031(ki)007:769: de ni 'di ltar ma rtog pas gol ba yin
NK031(ki)007:770: la rnal 'byor pa bying rgod yod med mnyam par
NK031(ki)007:771: rtogs pa'o // de'i phyir chos thams cad ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du shar ba'o //
NK031(ki)007:773: ye shes sna tshogs rang gsal bar //
NK031(ki)007:774: mi g.yo de bzhin nyid du zhog /
NK031(ki)007:776: dgu pa rig 'dzin dgongs pa nyams kyi glus bskul ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:777: rig pa khu byug gi dgongs pa rig pa klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:778: tsan+dana gor shi sha'i tshal du nam gyi cha stod
NK031(ki)007:779: la sras thu bo r+aa dza ha sti 'di skad
NK031(ki)007:781: kun gzhi ye nas ma bcos de bzhin chos kyi dbyings //
NK031(ki)007:782: rang byung ye shes mkha' 'dra mnyam pa chen po'i ngang //
NK031(ki)007:783: tshig dang yi ge'i sgra las 'das pa'i kun tu bzang //
NK031(ki)007:784: sems dang chos nyid mnyam zhing dbyer med na //
NK031(ki)007:785: lus ngag yid gsum mtshan ma cis bslad kyang //
NK031(ki)007:786: chos nyid byang chub sems la 'gyur med de //
NK031(ki)007:787: rnam rtog skyon spangs kun gzhi byang chub sems //
NK031(ki)007:788: ma bcos ngang du bzhag pa las //
NK031(ki)007:789: sgom pa gud na med par 'khums //
NK031(ki)007:790: sgyu ma'i phung po da lta bsnyil ba'i phyir //
NK031(ki)007:791: kun bzang thugs kyi 'od zer nga la shar //
NK031(ki)007:792: g+hi ti ma ko la sa ma a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:793: nam mkha' che dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang gsum pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:795: rig pa spyi blugs kyi man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba /
NK031(ki)007:796: me long gi ngos la nyi ma shar ba lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:797: gnyis pa de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:798: dus gsum gcig tu rtogs pas rang so la mi
NK031(ki)007:799: rtsol ba'i gding skyes bu mdun du lta ba lta
NK031(ki)007:800: bu thob bo // gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:801: re dogs dang bral bas gang la'ang 'jigs pa med pa smyon pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:803: lnga pa rig pa spyi blugs kyi man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:804: lus gnad rnam snang gi chos bdun bca' /
NK031(ki)007:805: rlung gnad rlung ro bus nas drag rlung bzung /
NK031(ki)007:806: khug pa bdun la thun gcig tu bya zhing /
NK031(ki)007:808: sems gnad tsit+ta rin po che'i gzhal yas su pad+ma a bco brgyad dang bcas pa gsal btab /
NK031(ki)007:809: bla ma'i tsit+ta'i pad 'dab mdun ma'i a 'od du zhu ba'i 'od /
NK031(ki)007:810: dkyil 'khor gyi pad 'dab mdun ma'i a la phog /
NK031(ki)007:811: de yang 'od du zhu ba'i 'od steng gi bum pa'i a la phog /
NK031(ki)007:812: bum pa'i a 'od du zhu ba'i 'od dkar nar
NK031(ki)007:813: gyis byung nas slob ma'i snying gi pad+ma mdun ma'i
NK031(ki)007:814: a la phog pas a 'od du zhu ba'i 'od
NK031(ki)007:815: kyis snying 'od kyis gang ba las mi tshad par
NK031(ki)007:816: lus kyi nang thams cad nam langs pa bzhin du
NK031(ki)007:817: skya wal gyis gang ba la sems gtad la bsgom
NK031(ki)007:818: du bcug cing / bla mas bum pa'i dbang gis
NK031(ki)007:819: brtan par bya zhing smon lam btab pa la sogs
NK031(ki)007:820: du bcug cing / pa 'gre / rjes shes lus 'od kyis gang ba la shes pa gtad la /
NK031(ki)007:821: gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:822: drug pa dbang gi dpe ni me long gi ngos la nyi ma shar ba lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:824: me long la has btab pas ba mo rang sangs pa bzhin /
NK031(ki)007:825: rig pa spyi blugs kyi man ngag gis rig pa
NK031(ki)007:826: rtsal gyi dbang thob pa'i stobs kyis gsal la rtog
NK031(ki)007:827: med kyi shes pa de sgrib g.yogs dang bral bar
NK031(ki)007:828: mtshon pa'o // bdun pa sbubs mchu ni /
NK031(ki)007:829: nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:830: rig pa gcig char lhug par bzhag /
NK031(ki)007:831: ces pa'i tshig phyi ma lan gsum bskyar ba 'chad par 'gyur pa'i dbang kun la 'agre'o //
NK031(ki)007:832: brgyad pa gdams ngag gi dgongs 'grel ni /
NK031(ki)007:833: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams
NK031(ki)007:834: cad rang rig pa thams cad du rang shar zhes
NK031(ki)007:835: bya ste gsal la ma bcos par 'dzin rtog gang
NK031(ki)007:836: yang med par gsal ba ste dper na me long
NK031(ki)007:837: la nyi ma shar bas gsal la rtog pa med
NK031(ki)007:838: pa lta bu'o // lhug par bzhag ces pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:839: dbang po lnga yul la yan pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:840: 'o na so so'i skye bo dang khyad par ci yod ce na /
NK031(ki)007:841: de ni de ltar ma rtogs pa'i phyir /
NK031(ki)007:842: ye shes la ye shes rol pa med pa'i phyir ro //
NK031(ki)007:843: de'i phyir rig pa gsal la rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
NK031(ki)007:845: rig pa de nyid dngos zhen med //
NK031(ki)007:846: des na rtog med gsal bar bzhag /
NK031(ki)007:848: dgu pa glus bskul ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:849: nam mkha' che'i dgongs pa ye shes klong rdol glu yi bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:850: me tog u dum wa ra'i tshal du nam gyi
NK031(ki)007:851: cha smad la sras mo s+aa r+aa nis 'di skad
NK031(ki)007:853: kun gzhi ma bcos ye nas chos kyi dbyings //
NK031(ki)007:854: rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma skyes 'jig 'bral med //
NK031(ki)007:855: rang byung lhun gyis grub pa'i bcom ldan 'das //
NK031(ki)007:856: gzung 'dzin yul las 'das pa rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs //
NK031(ki)007:857: bdag gi dgongs pa 'di las med par 'khums //
NK031(ki)007:858: sgyu ma'i phung po da lta bsnyil ba'i phyir //
NK031(ki)007:859: kun bzang thugs kyi gter chen bdag la babs //
NK031(ki)007:860: g+hi ta ma ko la hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:861: thig le drug pa dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang bzhi pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:863: sprul sku thug phrad kyi man ngag gis rig pa
NK031(ki)007:864: rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba ral gri kha mang gi
NK031(ki)007:865: so lta bu'o // gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:866: sgo gsum snying po gsal ba'i dge sdig spong len
NK031(ki)007:867: med pa'i gding thob pa ni khyi phag lam du
NK031(ki)007:868: zhugs pa lta bu thob bo //
NK031(ki)007:869: gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:870: thogs ma med pas spyod pa phyogs dang bral ba ste /
NK031(ki)007:871: dpa' bo glang po che zhon pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:873: lnga pa sprul sku thug phrad kyi man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:874: lus gnad rnam snang gi chos bdun bca' /
NK031(ki)007:875: rlung gnad rlung ro lan gsum bus la drag rlung
NK031(ki)007:876: bum pa can sngar bzhin bzung zhing thun ngo bo
NK031(ki)007:877: grangs khams tshod dang sbyar la spel /
NK031(ki)007:878: sems gnad tsit+ta rin po che'i gzhal yas su pad+ma a bco brgyad dang bcas pa gsal btab /
NK031(ki)007:879: bla ma tsit+ta'i pad+ma mdun ma'i a nas chos bskor
NK031(ki)007:880: gyi pad 'dab gnyis pa'i a 'od du zhu ba'i
NK031(ki)007:881: 'od dkyil 'khor gyi pad 'dab nub ma nas chos
NK031(ki)007:882: bskor du pad 'dab gnyis pa'i a la phog /
NK031(ki)007:883: de yang 'od du zhu bas steng gi bum pa'i a la phog /
NK031(ki)007:884: bum pa'i a 'od du zhu ba'i 'od dkar nar
NK031(ki)007:885: gyis byung nas slob ma'i snying gi pad+ma mdun ma'i
NK031(ki)007:886: a nas chos bskor du pad 'dab gnyis pa'i a
NK031(ki)007:887: la phog pas / a 'od du zhu ba'i 'od
NK031(ki)007:888: kyis lus nang gi 'od sngar bas kyang gsal du
NK031(ki)007:889: song ba'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu la sems
NK031(ki)007:890: gtad pa bsgom du gzhug cing /
NK031(ki)007:891: bla mas bum pa'i dbang gis brtan par bya zhing smon lam gdab pa sogs 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:892: rjes shes lus 'od kyis gang ba sngar bas kyang
NK031(ki)007:893: gsal ba la shes pa gtad la sems gnas pa
NK031(ki)007:894: med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:895: drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:896: ral gri kha mang gi so lta bu zhes pa /
NK031(ki)007:897: ral gri kha mang steng 'og mdun rgyab gang du
NK031(ki)007:898: brgyab kyang chod pa bzhin sprul sku thug phrad kyi
NK031(ki)007:899: man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang thob pa'i
NK031(ki)007:900: stobs kyis / sems las su rung bas ji ltar spyad kyang grol bar mtshon pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:902: dbul mo gter 'chang zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:903: thams cad sprul pa'i sku ste btang snyoms ngang //
NK031(ki)007:905: brgyad pa gdams ngag gi dgongs 'grel bshad pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:906: chos thams cad sprul pa'i skur sangs ma rgyas pa
NK031(ki)007:907: gcig kyang med pas sangs rgyas nang 'byams zhes bya
NK031(ki)007:908: ste / spu ma barjesa mdog ma bsgyur bar ma bcos pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:909: de'i phyir rnam rtog thams cad ma spangs par zhi bar byed pas ral gri kha mang dang 'dra'o //
NK031(ki)007:910: btang snyoms ngang zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog
NK031(ki)007:911: pa thams cad btang snyoms dgag sgrub dang bral ba'o
NK031(ki)007:912: // des na btang snyoms chen po'i ngang zhes bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:913: de ni btsal ba med par sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:914: de yang ma khol lung bstan pa las /
NK031(ki)007:915: chos rnams ye nas sangs rgyas pas //
NK031(ki)007:916: gzhan la re btsal gnyis dang bral //
NK031(ki)007:918: dgu pa glus bskul ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:919: thig le drug pa'i dgongs pa bde ba klong rdol gyi glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:920: skya rengs dang po shar tsam na /
NK031(ki)007:921: rgya mtsho'i gting du klu rgyal 'jog po 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:923: mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha' lta bu la //
NK031(ki)007:924: smra bsam yul las 'das pa chos kyi sku //
NK031(ki)007:925: srid gsum skye 'gro rnam par dag bya na //
NK031(ki)007:926: ma bcos rnam par dag pa'i kun gzhi byang chub sems //
NK031(ki)007:927: ma btsal mnyam par bzhag na sgom pa'i mchog /
NK031(ki)007:928: rig pa chos kyi dbyings su ma bcos la //
NK031(ki)007:929: rnam par grol ba'i lam mchog gzhan med de //
NK031(ki)007:930: dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nyid //
NK031(ki)007:931: dpag cing gzhal yang 'di las med par mjal //
NK031(ki)007:932: bdag gi phung po gdos bcas 'di bsnyil nas //
NK031(ki)007:933: kun bzang dbye ba med pa'i sa la mchis //
NK031(ki)007:934: g+hi ta ma ko la sa a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:935: rtsal chen dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang lnga pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:937: tshogs brgyad lhug pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal
NK031(ki)007:938: gyi dbang bskur bas skyes bu nad kyis gdung ba
NK031(ki)007:939: lta bu'o // gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:940: 'khor 'das snying po thig ler rtogs pas mtho dman
NK031(ki)007:941: dang re dogs med pa'i gding gser gyi rnam pa
NK031(ki)007:943: gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:944: lhug pa chen po'i spyod pa rang dgar gnas pa ste /
NK031(ki)007:945: mgron po rang yul du sleb pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:947: lnga pa tshogs brgyad lhug pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:950: tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor sngar bzhin gsal btab /
NK031(ki)007:951: bla ma'i pad 'dab gsum pa'i a 'od du zhu /
NK031(ki)007:952: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi a gsum pa la phog /
NK031(ki)007:953: de 'od du zhu ste steng gi bum pa'i a la phog /
NK031(ki)007:954: de yang 'od du zhu ba'i 'od skya nar gyis
NK031(ki)007:955: byung nas slob ma'i snying gi pad 'dab gsum pa'i
NK031(ki)007:956: a la phog pas lus kyi nang gi 'od sngar
NK031(ki)007:957: bas gsal du song bar bsam la sems gtad la
NK031(ki)007:959: bla mas bum pa'i dbang gis brtan par bya ba smon lam dang bcas pa 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:960: rjes shes lus 'od kyis gang ba sngar bas kyang
NK031(ki)007:961: gsal ba la shes pa gtad la sems gnas pa
NK031(ki)007:962: med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:963: drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:964: skyes bu nad kyis gdung ba lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:966: skyes bu nad kyis gdung ba lus kyi zung shor bas khrel 'dzem dang bral ba bzhin /
NK031(ki)007:967: tshogs brgyad lhug pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal
NK031(ki)007:968: gyi dbang thob pa'i stobs kyis sgo gsum rtsol ba
NK031(ki)007:969: dang bral nas lhug par gnas par mtshon pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:971: me long lta bu zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:972: spros med byang chub yan par gnas //
NK031(ki)007:974: brgyad pa gdams ngag gi dgongs 'grel bshad pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:975: chos thams cad byed pa po dang bral ba'i phyir
NK031(ki)007:976: yan pa lhug par ma bcos par gnas par bya
NK031(ki)007:977: ste ma btsal ma sgrub pas chos ma bslad ma
NK031(ki)007:978: bcos pa la blos rig pa lhug par rgya yan
NK031(ki)007:979: du btang bzung med par gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:980: de yang skyes bu nad kyis gdung bas ngo tsha dang bral ba bzhin du gnas so //
NK031(ki)007:981: yan par gan sa zhes bya ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:982: bying rgod yan pa ste dgag sgrub med pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:983: de ci'i phyir zhe na chos nyid la bzang ngan med pa'i phyir ro //
NK031(ki)007:984: de'i phyir thams cad yan pa lhug pa ma bkag par gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:986: bzang ngan blang dor med pa'i ye shes zang thal te //
NK031(ki)007:987: ye shes nyid la nyid spyod gser gling 'dra //
NK031(ki)007:990: rtsal chen gyi dgongs pa byang sems klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:991: skya rengs gnyis pa shar tsa na /
NK031(ki)007:992: rgya mtsho'i gling du khyi'i rgyal po ku ku r+aa dza 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:994: ye nas lhun grub kun tu bzang po'i ngang //
NK031(ki)007:995: gsal la mi rtog spros bral byang chub sems //
NK031(ki)007:996: mi 'gyur mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings nyid las //
NK031(ki)007:997: rig pa mi 'gyur mi bslad mnyam bzhag na //
NK031(ki)007:998: ci la yang mi rtog gang la'ang mi bsam ste //
NK031(ki)007:999: macha ga tu gsang ba'i rmad byung sems nyid 'di //
NK031(ki)007:1000: rna bas nyan pa la sogs spyod yul yod ma yin //
NK031(ki)007:1001: kun gzhi mi 'gyur dbyings chen la //
NK031(ki)007:1002: rig pa ma 'gyur ma yengs bzhag /
NK031(ki)007:1004: khams gsum rang sar grol bas btsal zhing sgrub mi dgos //
NK031(ki)007:1005: re zhing dogs pa med pa'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin //
NK031(ki)007:1006: g+hi ta ma ko la hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1007: sems sgom dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang drug pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1009: chos nyid klong rdol gyi man ngag gis rig pa
NK031(ki)007:1010: rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba chu bo chen po'i 'go
NK031(ki)007:1011: lta bu'o // gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1012: 'khor ba bde chen du rtogs pas gtsang rme dang blang dor re dogs med pa'i gding ni /
NK031(ki)007:1013: sngags pa dug za ba lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1014: gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1015: bde chen 'gyur med kyi spyod pa gcig tu mi gnas pa ste /
NK031(ki)007:1016: ngo mtshar du ma ston pa'i mi lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1018: lnga pa tshogs brgyad lhug pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1022: bla ma'i tsit+ta pad 'dab bzhi pa'i a 'od du zhu /
NK031(ki)007:1023: 'od de rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi a bzhi pa la phog pas de 'od du zhu /
NK031(ki)007:1024: 'od de steng gi bum pa'i a la phog /
NK031(ki)007:1025: 'od de dkar nar gyis byung nas slob ma rang
NK031(ki)007:1026: rang gi pad 'dab bzhi pa la gnas pa'i a
NK031(ki)007:1027: la phog pas lus kyi nang gi 'od sngar bas
NK031(ki)007:1028: kyang ches gsal du song ba la sems gtad la
NK031(ki)007:1030: bla mas bum dbang smon lam dang bcas dbang brtan par byed pa 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:1031: rjes shes lus 'od kyis gang bas sngar bas kyang
NK031(ki)007:1032: ches gsal du song ba la shes pa gtad la
NK031(ki)007:1033: gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1034: drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:1035: chu bo chen po'i 'go lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1036: zhes pa'i chu bo cha na po'i 'go rang rdol du byung ba bzhin /
NK031(ki)007:1037: ma byas pa'i chos nyid rkyen gyis ma skyes pa rang byung ba mtshon pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1039: thig le chen po zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1040: chos nyid bde chen ngang du gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1042: brgyad pa gdams ngag gi dgongs 'grel bshad pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1043: chos thams cad chos nyid du gsal bas /
NK031(ki)007:1044: 'gre log spyi tshugs gar skyes kyang chos nyid las
NK031(ki)007:1045: ma g.yos par bdag gzhan nam snang srid thams cad
NK031(ki)007:1046: chos nyid du gsal ba bzhin du sems nyid du
NK031(ki)007:1047: shar bas klong rdol zhes bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:1048: dper na chu bo'i 'go nas chu rang rdol du byung ba bzhin no //
NK031(ki)007:1049: ngang du gsal zhes bya ba ni bying rgod chos nyid du rtogs pas mnyam pa'i ngang ngo //
NK031(ki)007:1050: de'i phyir thams cad chos nyid du gsal ba de la dus gsum du gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1051: de yang shel phreng dkar po zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1052: snang srid thams cad chos nyid ye nas yin //
NK031(ki)007:1053: des na chos nyid de nyid de la spyod //
NK031(ki)007:1055: dgu pa glus bskul ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:1056: sems sgom gyi dgongs pa dbyings klong rdol glu yi bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:1057: rgyan chags dpal gyi ri'i gnas su skya rengs gsum pa shar tsam na /
NK031(ki)007:1060: snang ba thams cad ye nas dbyings chen la //
NK031(ki)007:1061: rig pa 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dur btab nas //
NK031(ki)007:1062: dbyings nyid mi 'gyur rig pas mi bslad de //
NK031(ki)007:1063: ma yengs mi 'gyur mkha' ltar dag pa las //
NK031(ki)007:1064: ma yengs ma bcos yongs kyi 'od gsal la //
NK031(ki)007:1065: sgom pa ming du btags pa gud na med par 'khums //
NK031(ki)007:1066: bdag gi phung po gdos bcas 'di //
NK031(ki)007:1067: dbye ba med pa'i sa la mchi //
NK031(ki)007:1068: g+hi ta ma ko la sa hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1069: rmad byung dang rjes su 'brel ba dang dbang bdun pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1071: dug lnga rang grol gyi man ngag gis rig pa
NK031(ki)007:1072: rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba rma bya dug gis 'tsho
NK031(ki)007:1073: ba lta bu'o // gnyis pa dbang bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1074: gzung 'dzin skye med du rtogs pas spyad kyang mi
NK031(ki)007:1075: gos pa'i gding ni pad+ma 'dam nas skyes pa lta
NK031(ki)007:1076: bu'o // gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1077: bag yangs chen pos spyod pa ci spyad kyang mi bardzi ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:1078: seng ge rtsal rdzogs pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1080: lnga pa dug lnga rang grol gyi man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1084: bla ma'i tsit+ta pad 'dab lnga pa'i a 'od du zhu /
NK031(ki)007:1085: 'od de rdul tshon lnga pa'i a la phog pas de yang 'od du zhu /
NK031(ki)007:1086: 'od de steng gi bum pa'i a la phog /
NK031(ki)007:1087: bum pa'i a zhu ba'i 'od de dkar nar gyis
NK031(ki)007:1088: byung nas slob ma rang rang gi snying gi pad+ma
NK031(ki)007:1089: lnga pa'i a la phog pas /
NK031(ki)007:1090: lus nang 'od kyis gang ba de sngar bas kyang shin tu gsal bar sgom du gzhug cing /
NK031(ki)007:1091: bla mas bum dbang smon lam dang bcas pas dbang brtan par byed /
NK031(ki)007:1092: rjes shes lus 'od shin tu gsal ba la shes
NK031(ki)007:1093: pa gtad la gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas
NK031(ki)007:1094: par bya'o // drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:1095: rma bya dug gis 'tsho ba lta bu zhes pas /
NK031(ki)007:1096: rma byas dug zos pas slar gyis lang tsho rgyas
NK031(ki)007:1097: pa bzhin dug lnga rang grol gyi man ngag gis
NK031(ki)007:1098: rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i stobs kyis nyon
NK031(ki)007:1099: mongs pa'i rang ngo ye shes su gsal ba mtshon
NK031(ki)007:1100: pa'o // bdun pa sbubs mchu ni /
NK031(ki)007:1101: seng ge 'gying ba lta bu zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1102: nyon mongs lnga nyid ye shes lnga ru gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1104: brgyad pa gdams ngag gi dgongs 'grel ni /
NK031(ki)007:1105: nyon mongs gang rung skyes pa'i dus su /
NK031(ki)007:1106: dper na sgras sgra gcod pa dang 'dra ste /
NK031(ki)007:1107: nyon mongs pa de nyid kyis nyon mongs pa gzhan zhi ste zil gyis mnan te /
NK031(ki)007:1108: nyon mongs pa de nyid las thabs gnyis kyis gnas par bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:1109: dbang po rtul po lta bu gsal bar gnas pa dang /
NK031(ki)007:1110: rnon po ye shes sam chos nyid du gsal bar
NK031(ki)007:1111: byas la btsal ba med pa'i tshul du gnas par
NK031(ki)007:1112: bya ste / dper na rma bya dug gis 'tsho ba bzhin te /
NK031(ki)007:1113: de nyid kho na bdud rtsi'am sman du gyur pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1114: ye shes lnga ru gsal ba zhes bya ba ni
NK031(ki)007:1115: rnam rtog ye shes su gsal bas spu ma barjesa
NK031(ki)007:1116: mdog ma bsgyur bar rang sar grol ba'o //
NK031(ki)007:1117: de'i phyir nyon mongs thams cad ye shes su gsal
NK031(ki)007:1118: bas shin tu rnal 'byor la gnas pa rnams kyis
NK031(ki)007:1119: nyon mongs pa mi spong zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1120: de yang rdo rje brtsegs pa las /
NK031(ki)007:1121: rnam rtog ye shes ngang du gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1122: des na ma spangs rang zhir zhog /
NK031(ki)007:1125: rmad byung gi dgongs pa 'byung lnga ye shes klong rdol glu yi bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:1126: dmar rengs dang po shar tsam na rgya mtsho'i 'gram du khyi'i rgyal po phyi ma 'di skad lo /
NK031(ki)007:1128: chos nyid byang chub sems ni 'byung ba lnga yin te //
NK031(ki)007:1129: ma bcos rang bzhin gsal bas mkha' ltar gnas //
NK031(ki)007:1130: 'gro ba'i gzung 'dzin bsregs pas me ltar gnas //
NK031(ki)007:1131: dmigs med gdod nas dag pas rlung ltar gnas //
NK031(ki)007:1132: gzung 'dzin skyon dang bral bas chu ltar gnas //
NK031(ki)007:1133: cis kyang skyon med sra bas sa ltar gnas //
NK031(ki)007:1134: 'byung ba lnga nyid ye nas chos nyid byang chub sems //
NK031(ki)007:1135: gdod nas dag pas nam mkha' 'dra ba la //
NK031(ki)007:1136: dmigs pa med pa ma yengs gnas pa las //
NK031(ki)007:1137: sgom pa 'di las med par rtogs //
NK031(ki)007:1138: bdag gi phung po gdos bcas 'di //
NK031(ki)007:1139: dbye ba med pa'i sa la mchis //
NK031(ki)007:1140: g+hi ta ma ko la sa a hoh zhes glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1141: yid bzhin nor bu dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang brgyad pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1143: 'khor ba dong sprugs kyis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang
NK031(ki)007:1144: bskur ba dpa' bo g.yul du 'jug pa lta bu'o
NK031(ki)007:1145: // gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1146: bde ba chen po'i rtogs pas khyad par 'phags pa'i
NK031(ki)007:1147: gding nyi zla dus gcig la shar ba lta bu
NK031(ki)007:1148: thob bo // gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1149: ci 'gyur thabs mkhas kyi spyod pa phyogs ris med pa ste /
NK031(ki)007:1150: gar mkhan gyi 'du byed lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1152: lnga pa 'khor ba dong sprug gi man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1156: bla ma'i tsit+ta'i pad+ma drug pa la gnas pa'i a 'od du zhu /
NK031(ki)007:1157: 'od de rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad 'dab drug pa'i a la phog /
NK031(ki)007:1158: a 'od du zhu ba'i 'od steng gi bum pa'i a la phog /
NK031(ki)007:1159: a zhu ba'i 'od dkar nar gyis byung nas slob
NK031(ki)007:1160: ma rang rang gi pad 'dab drug pa'i a la
NK031(ki)007:1161: phog pas a 'od du zhu nas lus gang ba
NK031(ki)007:1162: sngar bas cher song ba la sems gtad la bsgom
NK031(ki)007:1163: du gzhug cing / bla mas bum dbang smon lam dang bcas pas dbang brtan par byed pa 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:1164: rjes shes lus 'od kyis gang ba sngar bas cher
NK031(ki)007:1165: 'phel ba la sems gtad la gnas pa med pa'i
NK031(ki)007:1167: drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:1168: dpa' bo g.yul du 'jug pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1170: dpa' bo go mtshon dang bcas pas gzhan gyi g.yul bzlog par byed pa bzhin /
NK031(ki)007:1171: 'khor ba dong sprug gi man ngag gis rig pa
NK031(ki)007:1172: rtsal gyi dbang thob pa'i stobs kyis 'khor ba'i g.yul
NK031(ki)007:1176: mkha' lding chen po zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1177: 'khor ba ma btsal ye nas sangs rgyas yin //
NK031(ki)007:1179: brgyad pa gdams ngag gi dgongs 'grel bshad pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1180: khams gsum 'khor ba 'di nyid ye shes chen po
NK031(ki)007:1181: skyong ba'i thabs su gyur bas khams gsum sku gsung
NK031(ki)007:1183: de'i phyir 'khor ba dong sprug ces bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:1184: 'khor ba nyid bde gnas su rtogs pa /
NK031(ki)007:1185: de'i phyir bdag gzhan du snang la mi dmigs pas de la gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1186: ye nas sangs rgyas yin zhes bya ba ni mnyam
NK031(ki)007:1187: bzhag gi dus su rtogs pa ci 'gyu ba ye
NK031(ki)007:1188: shes su gsal bas dpa' bo g.yul du zhugs pa
NK031(ki)007:1190: de'i phyir 'khor ba ma spangs par rang sar grol ba zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1191: de yang r+aa hu la chen pos /
NK031(ki)007:1192: 'khor ba ma spangs ngang gis gsal ba la //
NK031(ki)007:1193: ye shes nyi ma de ni tshul du 'char //
NK031(ki)007:1196: yid bzhin nor bu'i dgongs pa dngos grub klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:1197: dmar rengs gnyis pa shar tsam na gnod sbyin mo byang chub 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:1199: chos nyid byang chub sems la blang zhing blta med de //
NK031(ki)007:1200: blta ba'i gzugs su yongs la snang //
NK031(ki)007:1201: cis kyang bcos su med la spyad du med //
NK031(ki)007:1202: sems kyi rang bzhin ci la'ang mi gnas te //
NK031(ki)007:1203: rig pa byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin yin //
NK031(ki)007:1204: ji ltar bslad kyang dbyings la 'gyur ba med //
NK031(ki)007:1205: dbyings nyid rig pas mi btsal te //
NK031(ki)007:1206: sems nyid mkha' ltar dag pa ste //
NK031(ki)007:1207: ma bcos rang bzhin med pa las //
NK031(ki)007:1208: sgom pa 'di las med par bdag gis rtogs //
NK031(ki)007:1209: bdag gi phung po gdos bcas 'di bsnyil nas //
NK031(ki)007:1210: kun bzang thugs kyi 'od zer bdag la shar //
NK031(ki)007:1211: g+hi ta ma ko la sa a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1212: rtse mo byung rgyal dang rjes su 'brel ba'i dbang dgu pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1214: ye shes gsal ba'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal
NK031(ki)007:1215: gyi dbang bskur ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po
NK031(ki)007:1216: lta bu'o // gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1217: snang srid thams cad nam mkhar gcig pas re dogs
NK031(ki)007:1218: thams cad med pa'i gding ni sa thob pa lta
NK031(ki)007:1219: bu thob bo // gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1220: thig le chen po'i spyod pa gcig las ma 'das te /
NK031(ki)007:1223: lnga pa ye shes gsal ba'i man ngag gis dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1226: tsit+ta'i pad+ma a dang bcas pa gsal gdab /
NK031(ki)007:1227: bla ma'i tsit+ta'i pad 'dab bdun pa la gnas pa'i a dang /
NK031(ki)007:1228: dkyil 'khor gyi pad 'dab bdun pa la gnas pa'i
NK031(ki)007:1229: a 'od du zhu ba la sogs pa a bzhi
NK031(ki)007:1231: khyad par gyi dmigs pa lus 'od kyis gang ba
NK031(ki)007:1232: je cher song ba la sems gtad la sgom du
NK031(ki)007:1233: gzhug cing / bla mas bum dbang smon lam dang bcas pas brtan par byed pa 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:1234: rjes shes lus 'od cher 'phel ba la shes pa gtad nas /
NK031(ki)007:1235: gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par kun la 'agre'o //
NK031(ki)007:1236: drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:1237: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1238: zhes pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po la gsal 'grib med pa bzhin /
NK031(ki)007:1239: ye shes gsal ba'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang thob pa'i stobs kyis /
NK031(ki)007:1240: ting nge 'dzin bying rgod dang bral bas gsal 'grib med par mtshon pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1242: ye shes phreng ba zhes pa'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1243: snang srid ye shes ngang du gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1245: brgyad pa man ngag gi dgongs 'grel ni /
NK031(ki)007:1246: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams
NK031(ki)007:1247: cad ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas pas
NK031(ki)007:1248: sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa ngang gis med pas
NK031(ki)007:1249: 'khor ba ka nas dag pas thams cad ye shes
NK031(ki)007:1250: su gsal bar khong du chud pa'i sangs rgyas dgongs
NK031(ki)007:1251: pa'i zhe phug rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1252: de'i phyir na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyang ngo bor 'char ba dang mtshungs so //
NK031(ki)007:1253: ngang du gsal zhes pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1254: nyi ma dang 'od dbyer med pa dang 'dra ste /
NK031(ki)007:1255: mi rtog pa dang rtogs pa dbyer med du rtogs pas dag go //
NK031(ki)007:1256: de'i phyir gsal la rtog pa med pa zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1257: de yang gu ru chen pos /
NK031(ki)007:1258: thams cad ye shes gsal ba'i rgyan //
NK031(ki)007:1259: de ltar rtogs pas dag pa yin //
NK031(ki)007:1262: rtse mo byung rgyal gyi dgongs pa /
NK031(ki)007:1263: rtsol med klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan shing nal byi sa la'i rtsar /
NK031(ki)007:1264: dmar rengs gsum pa shar tsam na smad 'tshong ma bud+d+ha ma ti 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:1265: e ma ho chos nyid byang chub sems //
NK031(ki)007:1266: brtag tu med de dpyad du med //
NK031(ki)007:1267: btsal zhing gnyen pos bcos su med //
NK031(ki)007:1268: sems las sangs rgyas logs na med //
NK031(ki)007:1269: btsal bas mi rnyed sems las sangs rgyas med //
NK031(ki)007:1270: sems kyi rang bzhin ma bcos sangs rgyas yin //
NK031(ki)007:1271: gdod nas ma btsal byang chub snying po la //
NK031(ki)007:1272: ting 'dzin ma bslad ngang gis gsal ba las //
NK031(ki)007:1273: sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di las med par 'khums //
NK031(ki)007:1274: bdag gi phung po gdos bcas 'di bsnyil nas //
NK031(ki)007:1275: kun bzang thugs kyi 'od zer bdag la shar //
NK031(ki)007:1276: g+hi ta ma ko la sa a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1277: spyi gcod dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang bcu pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1279: bde ba chen pos rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba lha bdud rtsis 'tsho ba lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1280: gnyis pa dbang bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1281: rig pa phyogs bral rtogs pas gol sgrib kyi g.yang sa med pa'i gding ni /
NK031(ki)007:1282: 'phrul gyi skyes bu bgrod pa lta bu thob bo //
NK031(ki)007:1283: gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1284: dbye ba med pa kun la spyod pa ste /
NK031(ki)007:1285: kun tu rgyu 'jigs pa med pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1287: lnga pa bde ba chen pos rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1291: pad 'dab brgyad pa'i a bzhi skor gyi dmigs pa 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:1292: bum dbang smon lam dang bcas pas dbang brtan par byed pa 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:1293: rjes shes rtogs pa ye shes su rgyas pa'i ngang
NK031(ki)007:1294: la gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o
NK031(ki)007:1295: // drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:1296: lha bdud rtsis 'tsho ba lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1297: zhes pas lha lus zag pa dang bral zhing bde
NK031(ki)007:1298: nyams dang ldan pa bzhin du rtogs pa ye shes
NK031(ki)007:1301: sems kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1302: sems kyi bde chen nyams myong gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1304: brgyad pa man ngag gi dgongs 'grel ni /
NK031(ki)007:1305: snang srid thams cad ye shes su gsal ba /
NK031(ki)007:1306: sems bde ba chen por gsal bas de bzhin du nyams su myong ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i nyams ni /
NK031(ki)007:1307: lkugs pas mar myong ba dang 'dra bas gnyis su
NK031(ki)007:1308: med pa'i bde ba chen po ma bcos ma bslad
NK031(ki)007:1310: des na lha'i lus bdud rtsis rgyas pas bde ba dang ldan pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1312: bying rgod bde ba chen por gsal ba'o //
NK031(ki)007:1313: des na bying rgod ma bcos par yan pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1314: ci'i phyir zhe na thams cad bde ba chen po las ma g.yos par rtogs pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1315: de yang lung phyi ma las /
NK031(ki)007:1316: nyams su myong ba'i bde chen ni //
NK031(ki)007:1317: thams cad gsal bas zhe phugs nyid //
NK031(ki)007:1320: spyi gcod kyi dgongs pas gsang ba klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:1321: shing nya gro d+ha'i rtsar srod kyi thun la 'jam dpal bshes gnyen phyi ma 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:1323: kun gzhi yangs pa'i dbye thang la //
NK031(ki)007:1324: dag pa'i klong nas nyi ma shar //
NK031(ki)007:1325: shar ba'i dus na nub pa med //
NK031(ki)007:1326: shar nas ma bcos gsal ba las //
NK031(ki)007:1327: sangs rgyas chos nyid snga phyi gsum //
NK031(ki)007:1328: gang du btsal yang rnyed thabs med //
NK031(ki)007:1329: kun gzhi yangs pa'i chos nyid la //
NK031(ki)007:1330: rig pa sems kyi nyi ma shar //
NK031(ki)007:1331: ma bcos nub pa med pa las //
NK031(ki)007:1333: myong na sems kyi bdud rtsi myong //
NK031(ki)007:1334: blta na rig pa'i ye shes ltos //
NK031(ki)007:1335: pad+ma ko la sha a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1336: spyi chings dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang bcu gcig pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1338: sems gyin 'ad'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba /
NK031(ki)007:1339: drang srong rlung nad can sman pa'i ngag nyan pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1340: gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1341: sna tshogs skye med du 'gyur ba de las mi
NK031(ki)007:1342: 'gyur bar rtogs pas nyon mongs pa mi spong ba'i
NK031(ki)007:1343: gding mgron po 'khrul pa spong ba lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1344: gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1345: bkag med yongs rdzogs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs gcig
NK031(ki)007:1346: tu mdzad pa ste lan tsh+wa'i rgya mtsho lta bu'o
NK031(ki)007:1348: lnga pa sems gyin 'ad'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1352: pad 'dab dgu pa'i a 'od du zhu ba'i dmigs
NK031(ki)007:1353: pa bzhi skor bsgom zhing bum dbang smon lam dang
NK031(ki)007:1354: bcas pa 'gre / rjes shes rtog pa ye shes
NK031(ki)007:1355: kyi dbang du 'du ba'i ngang la gnas pa med
NK031(ki)007:1356: pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1358: drang srong rlung nad can sman pa'i ngag la nyan pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1359: zhes pas rlung nad can sman pa mkhas pa'i ngag la mnyan pas 'bad med du grol ba bzhin /
NK031(ki)007:1360: sems gyin 'ad'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi
NK031(ki)007:1361: dbang thob pas dug lnga'i nad 'bad med du grol
NK031(ki)007:1364: sgron ma gsal ba zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1365: sems nyid gyin 'da' rnal mar zhog /
NK031(ki)007:1368: chos thams cad sems gyin 'da' ma gtogs pa skra'i tshal pa brgyar bshags pa tsam yang med pas /
NK031(ki)007:1369: gyin 'da' ma bcos pa rnal ma ma bslad pa la bzhag par bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:1370: nam mkha' dang sems dang chos nyid la sbyar ro //
NK031(ki)007:1371: des na drang srong rlung nad can sman pa'i ngag
NK031(ki)007:1372: la nyan nas lus ngag yid gsum gyin 'dar gnas
NK031(ki)007:1373: pa lta bu'o // rnal mar bzhag ces bya ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:1374: lus ngag yid gsum ma bcos par bzhag pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1375: de'i phyir na chos thams cad ni ma bcos pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1377: des na gyin 'dar gnas par gyis shig /
NK031(ki)007:1378: de yang lung gi rgyal po las /
NK031(ki)007:1379: sems kyi de nyid ma bcos gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1380: de ltar yin pa'i rtog pa med //
NK031(ki)007:1383: spyi chings kyi dgongs pa nam mkha' klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:1384: dpag bsam shing gi grib ma la /
NK031(ki)007:1385: tho rengs khar +aar+ya pa lo 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:1387: byang chub sems ni nam mkha' lta bu'i klong //
NK031(ki)007:1388: gsal la rtog pa med pa'i ye shes ni //
NK031(ki)007:1389: phyi dang nang med kun la gsal bar snang //
NK031(ki)007:1390: gdod nas dag pas nam mkha'i klong 'dra la //
NK031(ki)007:1391: rnam rtog bsreg pa'i ye shes mngon shar bas //
NK031(ki)007:1392: skye 'gag yangs dog rang bzhin med pa las //
NK031(ki)007:1393: sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di las med par mjal //
NK031(ki)007:1394: za na sems nyid bdud rtsi zo //
NK031(ki)007:1395: gon na chos nyid gos su gyon //
NK031(ki)007:1396: e ma ko la sha a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1397: bde ba phra bkod dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang bcu gnyis pa bskur thabs la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1399: rig pa mi g.yo bas rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba rgya mtsho chen po'i gting lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1400: gnyis pa dbang de bskur ba'i gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1401: sgo gsum dkyil 'khor du 'du shes pas /
NK031(ki)007:1402: sgo gsum gyi 'khrul pas mi 'jigs pa'i gding thag
NK031(ki)007:1403: pa la sbrul zhen gyi zhen pa log pa lta
NK031(ki)007:1404: bu thob bo // gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1405: ye shes rang shar gyi spyod pa kun tu mdzes pa ste /
NK031(ki)007:1406: rin po ches mgul mdzes pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1408: lnga pa sems mi g.yo bas rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1410: drag rlung bum pa can bzung /
NK031(ki)007:1411: tsit+ta'i pad+ma a dang bcas pa gsal btab /
NK031(ki)007:1412: pad+ma bcu pa'i a 'od du zhu ba'i dmigs pa
NK031(ki)007:1413: bzhi skor sgom zhing bum dbang smon lam dang bcas
NK031(ki)007:1414: pa 'gre / rjes shes bde gsal mi rtog pa'i
NK031(ki)007:1415: ngang la gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par
NK031(ki)007:1416: pa 'gre / bya'o // drug pa dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:1417: rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o //
