NK031(ki)007:1418: zhes pas rgya mtsho chen po kha cung zad rlung gis g.yos kyang gting g.yo ba med pa bzhin /
NK031(ki)007:1419: rig pa mi g.yo ba'i man ngag gis rig pa
NK031(ki)007:1420: rtsal gyi dbang thob pas ting nge 'dzin la bying
NK031(ki)007:1421: rgod kyi skyon gyis mi gnod pa mtshon pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1423: skyes bu gyad kyi rtsal 'chang zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1424: rig pa mi g.yo rgya mtsho bzhin du gnas //
NK031(ki)007:1427: chos thams cad rig pa chen por gsal bas re dogs ngang gis med do //
NK031(ki)007:1428: de bas na rig pa 'od gsal bar gnas pas ris med nam mkha' dang 'dra ste /
NK031(ki)007:1429: phyogs bcu gar yang nam mkha' las ma 'das pa
NK031(ki)007:1430: dang 'dra bar rtogs pa'i rig pa dang ldan pa'i
NK031(ki)007:1431: rnal 'byor pas dus gsum du rig pa rang bzhin
NK031(ki)007:1433: de nyid rgya mtsho chen por gsal ba mi g.yo ba dang 'dra'o //
NK031(ki)007:1434: rgya mtsho bzhin du gnas zhes bya ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:1435: chu phran thams cad rgya mtshor ro gcig pa dang 'dra bas /
NK031(ki)007:1436: chos thams cad rig pa 'od gsal bar ro gcig pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1437: des na rnam rtog thams cad ye shes su ro gcig pas mi spangs pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1438: de yang rgya lung chen mo las /
NK031(ki)007:1439: sems nyid mi rtog nam mkha'i ngang du gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1440: des na ma bcos rtog med ngang du shar //
NK031(ki)007:1443: bde ba phra bkod kyi dgongs pa phrin las klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:1444: rin po che'i gling na nam gung yol la /
NK031(ki)007:1445: o rgyan gyi mkhan po d+ha he 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:1447: sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa las //
NK031(ki)007:1448: sems las sangs rgyas logs na med //
NK031(ki)007:1449: sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa las //
NK031(ki)007:1450: rig pa mi 'gyur rang bzhin med pa 'di //
NK031(ki)007:1451: zab mo'i chos dbyings mi brjed don dam gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1452: rgya mtsho che ltar chos dbyings zab mo las //
NK031(ki)007:1453: rig pa mi 'gyur bzod cing nang nas 'char //
NK031(ki)007:1454: kun gzhi gtan nas sbyong ba'i nyi chen po //
NK031(ki)007:1455: mkha' ltar dag pas yongs la khyab par gdal //
NK031(ki)007:1456: chos nyid ye nas dag pas sbyang du med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:1457: rig pa mi 'gyur gdod nas gsal bar gnas //
NK031(ki)007:1458: phyin ci log gis ma bslad gsal bar gnas //
NK031(ki)007:1459: bde bar gshegs pas dgongs pa 'di las med par mjal //
NK031(ki)007:1460: chos nyid nam mkha' chen po la //
NK031(ki)007:1461: rnal 'byor khyung chen gshog pa lding //
NK031(ki)007:1462: kar+m+aa ko la sha a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1463: srog gi 'khor lo dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang bcu gsum pa bskur thabs la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1465: sems rdzogs pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi
NK031(ki)007:1466: dbang bskur ba nor bu rin po che lta bu'o
NK031(ki)007:1467: // gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1468: snang srid ye shes su rtogs te /
NK031(ki)007:1469: de nyid gdod nas bcos su med pa'i gding mkha' la nyi ma shar ba lta bu thob bo //
NK031(ki)007:1470: gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1471: sgo gsum chig chod du gsal ba'i spyod pa rig pa dus gcig tu gsal ba ste /
NK031(ki)007:1472: ro gsum ma 'dres pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1474: lnga pa sems rdzogs pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1476: 'jam rlung bum pa can sgom du gzhug /
NK031(ki)007:1478: pad 'dab bcu gcig pa'i a 'od du zhu ba'i dmigs pa bzhi skor bsgom zhing /
NK031(ki)007:1479: 'khor ba ye brdal gyi dgongs pa lus kyi 'od
NK031(ki)007:1480: rdzing du rdo bskyur ba'i gnyer ma ltar mched nas
NK031(ki)007:1481: yul khams 'od kyi dkar mer khengs pa la rig
NK031(ki)007:1482: pa gtad la / bum dbang smon lam dang bcas par 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:1483: rjes kyi shes pa ni 'khor ba ye brdal gyi
NK031(ki)007:1484: dgongs pa la gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas
NK031(ki)007:1485: par bya'o // drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:1486: nor bu rin po che lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1488: nor bu rin po che las ma g.yos pa bzhin
NK031(ki)007:1489: du bsod nams kyi dbang gis dgos 'dod 'byung ba
NK031(ki)007:1490: bzhin / sems rdzogs pa'i man ngag gis rig pa
NK031(ki)007:1491: rtsal gyi dbang thob pa'i stobs kyis 'khor ba ye
NK031(ki)007:1492: brdal gyi dgongs pa las ma g.yos par dngos grub
NK031(ki)007:1496: lha mo mkha' lding zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1497: 'khor 'das sems la rdzogs par lhun gyis grub //
NK031(ki)007:1500: sems kyi de kho na nyid la snang srid 'khor 'das thams cad lhun gyis grub pas /
NK031(ki)007:1501: rdzogs pa chen po zhes bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:1502: dper na ri bo lhun po'i kha ru phyin pas
NK031(ki)007:1503: gser gyi ri bdun las phyi'i lcags ri man chad
NK031(ki)007:1504: rtsol ba med par gsal ba dang 'dra bar sems
NK031(ki)007:1505: kyi de kho na nyid rtogs na chos thams cad
NK031(ki)007:1506: rtsol ba med par rtogs pas yon tan thams cad
NK031(ki)007:1508: dper na nor bu rin po che lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1509: des na 'dod pa thams cad 'byung ba'o //
NK031(ki)007:1511: lhun gyis grub ces pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1512: bying rgod ye shes lhun grub tu gnas pas mi 'gal ba'o //
NK031(ki)007:1513: de yang klong chen 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1514: sems la thams cad rdzogs par lhun grub ste //
NK031(ki)007:1515: bcos bslad dgag sgrub med par ye shes gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1518: srog gi 'khor lo'i dgongs pa rang byung klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:1519: nya gro d+ha'i dgon par srod yol ba'i dus su drang srong b+hi sha ti 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:1521: ma bcos mkha' la gza' skar kun 'phyo bas //
NK031(ki)007:1522: gdod nas dag pas mkha' ni mi brjod de //
NK031(ki)007:1523: byang chub sems ni mkha' ltar dag pa la //
NK031(ki)007:1524: mtshan ma'i rnam rtog sgyu mas ci bslad kyang //
NK031(ki)007:1525: rnam dag sems nyid dbyings la 'pho 'gyur med //
NK031(ki)007:1526: chos dbyings brdal ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK031(ki)007:1527: rig pa ye shes dur sa btab pa ni //
NK031(ki)007:1528: gsang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'char //
NK031(ki)007:1529: shar ba nyid kyi don de ma yengs las //
NK031(ki)007:1530: sangs rgyas rnams la dgongs pa 'di las med //
NK031(ki)007:1531: rig pa ye shes rlung chen gyis //
NK031(ki)007:1532: rnam par rtog pa'i mun pa g.yengs //
NK031(ki)007:1533: a ka sha ko la ma d+h+aa a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1534: rin po che kun 'dus dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang bcu bzhi pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1536: gnyis med ngang gi man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba mar me'i 'od lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1537: gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1538: 'bras bu dus gcig la rtogs pas rgyu la ltos
NK031(ki)007:1539: pa med pa'i gding yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta
NK031(ki)007:1540: bu'o // gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1541: rtog pa rang sor gcod pa ji ltar gnas pa ltar bde ba ste /
NK031(ki)007:1542: nam mkha' las char babs pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1544: lnga pa gnyis med rang gi man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1548: pad 'dab bcu gnyis pa'i a bzhi skor gyi dmigs pa bsgom zhing /
NK031(ki)007:1549: 'khor ba ye brdal gyi dgongs pa lus kyi 'od
NK031(ki)007:1550: rdzing du rdo bskyur ba ltar mched pa de cher
NK031(ki)007:1551: mched nas / 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyis dkar mer khengs pa la sems gtad la /
NK031(ki)007:1552: bum dbang smon lam dang bcas pa 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:1553: rjes kyi shes pa ni 'khor ba ye brdal gyi
NK031(ki)007:1554: dgongs pa gsal la rtog med kyi ngang la gnas
NK031(ki)007:1555: pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1556: drug pa dbang gi dpe ni mar me'i 'od lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1557: zhes pas mar me rang gis rang gsal ba ltar //
NK031(ki)007:1558: gnyis su med pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal
NK031(ki)007:1559: gyi dbang thob pa'i stobs kyis sems nyid rang gsal
NK031(ki)007:1560: rtog pa med pa mtshon pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1562: man ngag ye shes 'khyil pa las /
NK031(ki)007:1563: gnyis med ye shes ngang du ro gcig pas //
NK031(ki)007:1566: chos thams cad gnyis su med par gsal ba rtogs pas thag chod par byas la /
NK031(ki)007:1567: de nas nyams gsum la bcos thabs dang bcas pas gnas par bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:1568: gnyis med ngang las ma gtogs pa'i chos til 'bru
NK031(ki)007:1569: tsam zhig ma rnyed pas gsal la rtog pa med
NK031(ki)007:1570: par mar me rlung med pa ltar gnas par byas
NK031(ki)007:1571: la / de nyid gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1572: ro gcig pas zhes pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1573: bying rgod gnyis med du ro gcig pas dgag sgrub dang bral ba'o //
NK031(ki)007:1574: de yang bdud rtsi 'khyil ba las /
NK031(ki)007:1575: thams cad gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems //
NK031(ki)007:1576: yin par bdag cag rnams kyis rtogs //
NK031(ki)007:1579: rin po chen kun 'dus kyi dgongs pa skye med klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:1580: rgyal ba'i dgon gnas su nam smad la sras mo go ma de wi 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:1582: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs nyid yi ge a yin te //
NK031(ki)007:1583: a yi rang bzhin ye nas dngos po med //
NK031(ki)007:1584: bde gshegs kun gyi 'byung gnas a yin te //
NK031(ki)007:1585: bden gnyis la sogs snang srid cir snang yang //
NK031(ki)007:1586: a yi dngos gzhi ye nas byang chub sems //
NK031(ki)007:1588: smra bsam yul las 'das pa'i byang chub dbyings nyid la //
NK031(ki)007:1589: a ltar skye ba med pa'i byang chub sems //
NK031(ki)007:1590: ma bcos ma yengs mnyam par bzhag pa las //
NK031(ki)007:1591: bdag gi dgongs pa 'di las med par mjal //
NK031(ki)007:1592: chos nyid dbye thang chen po la //
NK031(ki)007:1593: rig pa ye shes rta pho rgyug /
NK031(ki)007:1594: ka pa la ka ma pa sha a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1595: skye med rang rig dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang bco lnga pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1597: rdo rje rang 'khrungs kyi man ngag gis rig pa
NK031(ki)007:1598: rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba chu bo chen po'i gzhung
NK031(ki)007:1599: lta bu'o // gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1600: snang srid skye med du gsal bas 'khrul ma 'khrul
NK031(ki)007:1601: blang dor med pa'i gding rmi lam gyi sgra snyan
NK031(ki)007:1603: gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1604: sgo gsum rlung zhugs kyi spyod pa ni dam las mi 'da' ba ste /
NK031(ki)007:1605: rin po che gser gling du phyin pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1607: lnga pa rdo rje rang 'khrungs kyi man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1610: tsit+ta'i pad+ma a dang bcas pa gsal btab /
NK031(ki)007:1611: pad 'dab bcu gsum pa'i a zhu ba'i dmigs pa bzhi skor bsgom zhing /
NK031(ki)007:1612: 'khor ba ye brdal gyi dgongs pa lus 'od shin tu che bar mched /
NK031(ki)007:1613: a nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa 'od kyi rang bzhin
NK031(ki)007:1614: du gyur nas gzhan pa'i sems med pa la rig
NK031(ki)007:1615: pa gtad la / bum dbang smon lam dang bcas pa 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:1616: rjes kyi shes pa 'khor ba ye brdal gyi dgongs pa /
NK031(ki)007:1617: gsal la rtog med kyi 'dzin pa rang dag gi
NK031(ki)007:1618: ngang la gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par
NK031(ki)007:1619: bya'o // drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:1620: chu bo chen po'i gzhung lta bu zhes pas /
NK031(ki)007:1621: chu bo chen po'i gzhung la rgyun chad med pa
NK031(ki)007:1622: bzhin du rdo rje rang 'khrungs kyi man ngag gis
NK031(ki)007:1623: rig pa rtsal gyi dbang thob pa'i stobs kyis /
NK031(ki)007:1624: gsal la rtog med kyi shes pa der 'dzin dang bral ba de rgyun chags su gnas so //
NK031(ki)007:1627: thig le nyi shar zhes pa'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1628: gnyis med rdo rje ye shes gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1631: chos thams cad rdo rje rang 'khrungs su sangs rgyas
NK031(ki)007:1632: pas sangs ma rgyas pa'i chos ni gcig kyang yod
NK031(ki)007:1634: thams cad rig pa'i ye shes su gsal ba zhes bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:1635: des na 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ye shes kyi nyi ma shar ba zhes bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:1636: de las gzhan pa ngang gis med do //
NK031(ki)007:1637: de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1638: de bas na chu bo'i gzhung chen po mi 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o //
NK031(ki)007:1639: rig pa gsal ba zhes bya ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:1640: mnyam pa'i ngang la bzang ngan gyi 'du shes dang bral ba'o //
NK031(ki)007:1641: de'i phyir ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor la blo'i rig pa ma bcos par 'char ro //
NK031(ki)007:1642: de yang glang po rab 'bog las /
NK031(ki)007:1643: gnyis med bde chen ngang gis gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1644: de bzhin ma bcos rnal mar zhog /
NK031(ki)007:1647: skye med rang rig gi dgongs pa chos sku klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:1648: tsan+dana sdong po'i rtsar gung thun la /
NK031(ki)007:1649: kha che'i rgyal po rab snang 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:1651: byang chub sems ni ye nas chos kyi sku //
NK031(ki)007:1652: mkha' dang 'dra bar kun la khyab par snang //
NK031(ki)007:1653: snang ba nyid kyang stong pa ste //
NK031(ki)007:1654: stong pa'i cho 'phrul cir snang ba //
NK031(ki)007:1655: bsam du rdul tsam med pa la //
NK031(ki)007:1656: brjod bral med par ma yengs zhog /
NK031(ki)007:1657: chos nyid sems kyi bdud rtsi yis //
NK031(ki)007:1658: khams gsum 'khor ba'i nad pa gsos //
NK031(ki)007:1659: ka pa la ko sha a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1660: bde 'byams dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang bcu drug pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1662: btang snyoms chen po'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal
NK031(ki)007:1663: gyi dbang bskur ba 'dun ma la mos pa'i skyes
NK031(ki)007:1664: bu lta bu'o // gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1665: gnyis snang gi ngo bo gnyis med du rtogs pas
NK031(ki)007:1666: gnyis 'dzin kun dang bral ba'i gding rang sor gnas
NK031(ki)007:1667: pa'i shes pa lta bu thob bo //
NK031(ki)007:1668: gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1669: 'gyur ba med pa'i spyod pa rkyen gyis mi 'phrog pa ste /
NK031(ki)007:1670: ma h+aa de wa'i gding lta bu /
NK031(ki)007:1672: lnga pa btang snyoms chen po'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1675: tsit+ta'i pad+ma a dang bcas pa gsal btab /
NK031(ki)007:1676: pad+ma 'dab ma bcu bzhi pa'i a zhu ba'i dmigs pa bzhi skor bsgom zhing /
NK031(ki)007:1677: khams gsum dong sprug gi dgongs pa 'jig rten gyi
NK031(ki)007:1678: khams 'od kyis khyab pa thams cad kyang me long
NK031(ki)007:1679: la has btab pa bzhin du slar 'dus nas thig
NK031(ki)007:1680: le chen po'i rang bzhin gsal ba yul gyi mi
NK031(ki)007:1681: 'phrog pa la rig pa gtad la /
NK031(ki)007:1682: sgo gsum khong nas klod du bcug la /
NK031(ki)007:1683: dbang brtan byed kyi bum dbang smon lam dang bcas pa yang 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:1684: rjes kyi shes pa khams gsum dong sprug gi dgongs
NK031(ki)007:1685: pa phyi rol yul gyi snang ba blo'i yul las
NK031(ki)007:1687: snang la ngos bzung med pa'i ngang la gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1688: drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:1689: 'dun ma la mos pa'i skyes bu lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1690: zhes pas gtso bo gzu bor gnas pa'i blo can zhal lce drang por gcod pa bzhin /
NK031(ki)007:1691: btang snyoms chen po'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal
NK031(ki)007:1692: gyi dbang thob pa'i stobs kyis rig pa 'khrul phyir
NK031(ki)007:1693: du mi 'brang bar phyogs ris kyi 'dzin pa las
NK031(ki)007:1696: chos nyid nam mkha' ltar yangs pa zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1697: blang dor med cing mnyam pa'i ngang du gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1700: snang srid thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang du gsal ba /
NK031(ki)007:1701: de yang rang byung ye shes lnga ru rang byung rang thim la /
NK031(ki)007:1702: lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs su sangs rgyas pas /
NK031(ki)007:1703: sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal du med do //
NK031(ki)007:1704: des na dgra zun mnyam pa'i skyes bu lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1705: ngang du gsal zhes pa ni rtog pa thams cad
NK031(ki)007:1706: mnyam pa'i ngang du ro gcig pas dug lnga ma
NK031(ki)007:1707: spangs par rang sar dag pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1708: de'i phyir mnyam pa'i ngang la blo ma bcos par gnas pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1709: de yang dri med bshes gnyen gyi man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1710: dug lnga ye shes lnga ru gsal //
NK031(ki)007:1711: de ltar rtogs na rig mchog yin //
NK031(ki)007:1714: bde 'byams kyi dgongs pa sku gsum klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:1715: grong khyer dpal yon du srod kyi dus su rgyal po de wa r+aa dza 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:1717: snang srid chos rnams mngon du ltos pa rnams //
NK031(ki)007:1718: yang dag nyid du 'di ltar bsgom par bya //
NK031(ki)007:1719: snang srid thams cad ye nas kun tu bzang po'i ngang //
NK031(ki)007:1720: 'di las gzhan med ma yengs mnyam bzhag pas //
NK031(ki)007:1721: sgom par bya ba 'di las med par rtogs //
NK031(ki)007:1722: lus ni sgyu ma'i phung po ming tsam ste //
NK031(ki)007:1723: sems ni ye shes chen por son //
NK031(ki)007:1724: tsan+t+ra de wa ko sa la a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1725: nam mkha' rgyal po dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang bcu bdun pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1727: rtse gcig pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi
NK031(ki)007:1728: dbang bskur ba skyes bu 'dod chags kyis gdung ba
NK031(ki)007:1729: lta bu'o // gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1730: rang byung dam tshig gsal bas nyams pa'i rtogs pas
NK031(ki)007:1731: mi 'jigs pa'i gdeng 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
NK031(ki)007:1732: bran gyi chad pas mi 'jigs pa lta bu thob
NK031(ki)007:1733: bo // gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1734: dmigs pa med pa'i spyod pa gang du yang mi rtog pa ste /
NK031(ki)007:1735: nam mkha' la blta ba'i skyes bu lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1737: lnga pa rtse gcig pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1740: tsit+ta'i pad+ma a dang bcas pa gsal btab /
NK031(ki)007:1741: pad 'dab bco lnga pa'i a zhu ba'i dmigs pa bzhi skor bsgom zhing /
NK031(ki)007:1742: khams gsum dong sprug gi dgongs pa /
NK031(ki)007:1743: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyis khyab pa thams cad
NK031(ki)007:1744: kyang me long la has btab pa bzhin du slar
NK031(ki)007:1745: 'dus nas / thig le chen po'i rang bzhin shin
NK031(ki)007:1746: tu phra zhing gsal ba la rig pa gtad la
NK031(ki)007:1747: sgo gsum khong nas klod du gzhug /
NK031(ki)007:1748: dbang brtan byed bum dbang smon lam dang bcas pa 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:1749: rjes kyi shes pa khams gsum dong sprug gi dgongs pa /
NK031(ki)007:1750: nang yid kyi rtog pa snga phyi blo'i yul las 'das nas /
NK031(ki)007:1751: ji ltar 'gyu yang ngos bzung las 'das pa'i ngang
NK031(ki)007:1752: la gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o
NK031(ki)007:1753: // drug pa dbang gi dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:1754: skyes bu 'dod chags kyis gdung ba lta bu zhes pa /
NK031(ki)007:1755: 'dod chags kyis gdung ba'i skyes bu de 'dod zhen
NK031(ki)007:1756: las gzhan du mi g.yo ba bzhin sems rtse gcig
NK031(ki)007:1757: pa'i man ngag gis rig pa rtsal gyi dbang thob
NK031(ki)007:1758: pa'i stobs kyis blo bral gyi rig pa yul phyir
NK031(ki)007:1761: ye shes chen po zhes pa'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1762: gang nas bltas kyang ye shes rtse gcig 'char //
NK031(ki)007:1765: chos thams cad phyi nas bltas na nang gsal /
NK031(ki)007:1766: nang nas bltas na phyi gsal bas ye shes zang thal te /
NK031(ki)007:1767: phyi nang sgo phugs med par gsal la rtog pa med par 'char ro //
NK031(ki)007:1768: des na gang ltar yang ye shes rtse gcig pa zhes bya ste /
NK031(ki)007:1769: skyes bu 'dod pas gdung ba sems gzhan du mi g.yo ba bzhin no //
NK031(ki)007:1771: bying rgod gnyis ye shes rtse gcig pa'i bskul ma yin te /
NK031(ki)007:1772: shing bsnon pa'i me bzhin no //
NK031(ki)007:1773: 'phags pa drang srong mig gi man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1774: yengs med rtse gcig bsam dang bral //
NK031(ki)007:1775: des na ye shes zang thal yin //
NK031(ki)007:1778: nam mkha' rgyal po'i dgongs pa grol ba klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan /
NK031(ki)007:1779: me tog gi tshal du nam gyi cha stod la /
NK031(ki)007:1782: sems kyi rang bzhin ye nas mdzod chen las //
NK031(ki)007:1783: gang ltar rtogs shing ji ltar snang ba kun //
NK031(ki)007:1784: 'byung 'jug 'byung ba thams cad med na kun tu bzang //
NK031(ki)007:1785: gnyis su med pa'i rig pa de //
NK031(ki)007:1786: kun tu bzang po'i sems la gnas //
NK031(ki)007:1787: rig pa'i dbyings las ma bslad pas //
NK031(ki)007:1788: bsgom zhing gnas pa 'di la med //
NK031(ki)007:1789: kye ma ma rtogs snying re rje //
NK031(ki)007:1790: bdag nyid rang sar grol ba a la la //
NK031(ki)007:1791: d+ho ha ko sa sha a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1792: rje btsun dam pa dang rjes su 'brel ba dbang bco brgyad pa bskur ba la dgu las /
NK031(ki)007:1794: ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa'i man ngag gis rig
NK031(ki)007:1795: pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba g.yo sgyu dang bral
NK031(ki)007:1797: gnyis pa dbang de bskur bas gding ci thob na /
NK031(ki)007:1798: bdag nyid 'bras bur shar bas 'bras bu gzhan nas
NK031(ki)007:1799: mi 'tshol ba'i gding rnyed pa lta bu'i gding thob
NK031(ki)007:1800: bo // gsum pa gding de lam du slong ba'i spyod pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1801: gnyen po med pa'i spyod pa gang ltar spyod kyang skyon gyis mi gos pa ste /
NK031(ki)007:1802: 'phrul gyi skyes bu'i mdzad pa lta bu'o //
NK031(ki)007:1804: lnga pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa'i rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)007:1807: tsit+ta'i pad+ma a dang bcas pa gsal btab /
NK031(ki)007:1808: pad 'dab bcu drug pa'i a 'od du zhu ba'i dmigs pa bzhi skor bsgom zhing /
NK031(ki)007:1809: khams gsum dong sprug gi dgongs pa 'jig rten gyi
NK031(ki)007:1810: khams 'od kyis khyab pa thams cad kyang me long
NK031(ki)007:1811: la has btab pa bzhin du slar 'dus nas thig
NK031(ki)007:1812: le chen po'i rang bzhin du gsal ba de thig
NK031(ki)007:1813: le shin tu phra ba la 'dus nas de yang
NK031(ki)007:1814: yal gyis yal ba la rig pa gtad la ci
NK031(ki)007:1815: yang yid la mi bya ba'i ngang la rang lugs
NK031(ki)007:1816: su glod la / dbang brtan byed bum dbang smon lam dang bcas pa 'gre /
NK031(ki)007:1817: rjes kyi shes pa khams gsum dong sprug gi dgongs
NK031(ki)007:1818: pa gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma mtha' dag dang bral
NK031(ki)007:1819: nas / 'gag med kyi rang rtsal 'khor 'das kyi
NK031(ki)007:1820: snang ba cir snang ci srid ci shar yang ngos
NK031(ki)007:1821: bzung las 'das pa'i rang rig yul med rang gsal
NK031(ki)007:1822: gyi ngang la gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas
NK031(ki)007:1823: nas / par bya'o // drug pa dpe ni /
NK031(ki)007:1824: g.yo sgyu dang bral ba'i mi lta bu zhes pa
NK031(ki)007:1825: dper na mi zol med g.yo sgyu dang bral bas
NK031(ki)007:1826: mi bslu nges pa bzhin du /
NK031(ki)007:1827: ma bcos lhun grub kyi man ngag gis rig pa
NK031(ki)007:1828: rtsal gyi dbang bskur thob pa'i stobs kyis bslu mi
NK031(ki)007:1829: srid de / gnas lugs rang ngo shes rang sa zin rang sar grol ba mtshon pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1831: nam mkha' sprin dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i man ngag las /
NK031(ki)007:1832: chos rnams ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang //
NK031(ki)007:1833: zhes tshig phyi ma lan gsum brjod do //
NK031(ki)007:1834: brgyad pa gdams ngag gi dgongs 'grel bshad pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1835: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pas chos thams
NK031(ki)007:1836: cad bcos bslad dang bral ba rnal ma ma bcos
NK031(ki)007:1837: pa la / blo de bzhin rnal mar gnas pas
NK031(ki)007:1838: chos thams cad lhun gyis grub par bstan pas gsal
NK031(ki)007:1839: pa la / ba la / thams cad kyi dngos gazhi'o zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1840: de nyid g.yo sgyu dang bral bas mi ma bcos pa dang 'dra'o //
NK031(ki)007:1841: ngang zhes pa ni chos thams cad byang chub kyi ngang las ma g.yos pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1842: des na byang chub sems kyi klong la gnas pa zhes pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1843: de yang sgom lung chen mo las /
NK031(ki)007:1844: bcos bslad med par ka nas dag pa la //
NK031(ki)007:1845: gnyis su 'dzin pa'i yongs ye ngang gis med //
NK031(ki)007:1848: rje btsun dam pa'i dgongs pa /
NK031(ki)007:1849: shes rab klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan //
NK031(ki)007:1850: dben pa chen po'i gnas su bud+d+ha gup+ta 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:1852: chos rnams thams cad ma bcos kun tu bzang po la //
NK031(ki)007:1853: gsal la 'gyur ba med pa byang sems ngang de la //
NK031(ki)007:1854: mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pas ma bslad de //
NK031(ki)007:1855: rnam rtog rang byung rang zhir gnas pa las //
NK031(ki)007:1856: sgom pa 'di las gud du med par 'khums //
NK031(ki)007:1857: sems kyi me long ma bltas na //
NK031(ki)007:1858: rnam rtog dri mas gos ta re //
NK031(ki)007:1859: pra dz+ny+aa ko sa la a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1860: 'di ltar dbang bco brgyad po yang sems 'dzin gyi
NK031(ki)007:1861: dmigs pa lnga la brten nas ngo sprad pa yin
NK031(ki)007:1862: te / dmigs pa dang po a dkar po 'od 'phro ba la sems bzung /
NK031(ki)007:1863: gnyis pa snying 'od kyi gong bu la sems bzung
NK031(ki)007:1864: ste rlung ro bus nas 'jam rlung rtsol med du
NK031(ki)007:1866: dmigs pa gsum pa lus 'od kyi gong bu la sems bzung ste /
NK031(ki)007:1867: dbang gsum pa nas bcu gnyis kyi bar du drag rlung bum pa can bsgom zhing /
NK031(ki)007:1868: de yang dbang lnga'i bar du thun gyi ngo bo dang grangs gnyis kar 'phel /
NK031(ki)007:1869: de nas dbang lnga'i bar du thun gyi ngo bo 'phel grangs 'grib bo //
NK031(ki)007:1870: de nas dmigs pa bzhi pa 'khor ba ye gdal la sems bzung ste /
NK031(ki)007:1873: bco lnga pa gsum la 'jam rlung bum pa can
NK031(ki)007:1874: du byas la thun gyi grangs mi bzung ngo bo
NK031(ki)007:1875: 'phel lo // de nas dmigs pa lnga pa khams gsum dong sprug la sems bzung ste /
NK031(ki)007:1878: bco brgyad pa gsum la 'jam rlung rtsol med thun mtshams med par nyams su blangs te /
NK031(ki)007:1879: chu bo rgyun gyi rnal 'byor du bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1880: de ltar sgom bya sgom byed bral ba'i ngang la gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pas /
NK031(ki)007:1881: 'khor 'das gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad lus
NK031(ki)007:1882: la gnas pa'i rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis
NK031(ki)007:1883: su gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi kun tu bzang po
NK031(ki)007:1884: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'dus /
NK031(ki)007:1885: de yang mtshan dang dpe byad brgyad cu rtsa gnyis
NK031(ki)007:1886: kyi rang bzhin kun tu bzang po brgyad cu rtsa
NK031(ki)007:1887: gnyis su 'dus / de yang ye shes kyi rtsa
NK031(ki)007:1888: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi
NK031(ki)007:1889: kun tu bzang po lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su
NK031(ki)007:1890: gnyis su 'dus / 'dus / de yang snying gi
NK031(ki)007:1891: rtsa 'dab bcu drug lte ba dang bcas pa la
NK031(ki)007:1892: gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi kun tu bzang po bco
NK031(ki)007:1893: gnyis su 'dus / 'dus / brgyad du 'dus / de yang rgyu rkyen med par rang byung zhing /
NK031(ki)007:1894: byed pa po med par lhun gyis grub pas /
NK031(ki)007:1895: blang ba med cing dor ba med pa'i phyir /
NK031(ki)007:1896: kun tu bzang po zhes tha snyad du btags te /
NK031(ki)007:1897: rang byung gi ye shes thig le nyag gcig sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa /
NK031(ki)007:1898: don thun mong ma yin pa /
NK031(ki)007:1899: dgos ched kyi dbang gis ji ltar btags kyang /
NK031(ki)007:1900: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad de bzhin nyid dang
NK031(ki)007:1901: gzhan du brjod du med par thag chod na dbang
NK031(ki)007:1902: thams cad rdzogs pa yin no //
NK031(ki)007:1903: rten gyi gang zag las dang po pa rtog pa'i
NK031(ki)007:1904: ngang la mi gnas pa bying rgod kyi skyon gang
NK031(ki)007:1905: byung yang / bcos pa'i thabs gnyis te /
NK031(ki)007:1906: seng ge'i sgra ltar bcos pa dang /
NK031(ki)007:1907: seng pa ga la ltar bcos pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1908: seng ge'i sgra ltar bcos pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1909: gcan gzan gyi rgyal po seng ge nags na nyal ba la /
NK031(ki)007:1910: gcan gzan gzhan gyis tho 'tshams par rtsom na /
NK031(ki)007:1911: seng ges ngar skad bton pa tsam gyis gcan gzan
NK031(ki)007:1912: thams cad zil gyis non nas 'thab pa'i rtsol ba
NK031(ki)007:1914: rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bco brgyad po'i don dran pa tsam gyis bying rgod dbyings su yal nas /
NK031(ki)007:1915: thabs sam rten 'brel la rag ma lus par shes par bya'o //
NK031(ki)007:1916: bcos thabs gnyis pa seng pa ga la ltar bcos pa ni /
NK031(ki)007:1917: seng pa ga la'i yan lag la mdun rgyab med cing lus kyi mtha' yan lag gis 'khor bas /
NK031(ki)007:1918: mgo 'phongs g.yas g.yon gang gis kyang 'gros shes pa bzhin /
NK031(ki)007:1919: rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bco brgyad kyi don dran
NK031(ki)007:1920: pa tsam gyis lam du ma gyur pa gang yang
NK031(ki)007:1921: med de / 'gal rkyen ltar snang ba thams cad
NK031(ki)007:1922: kyang rang byung gi ye shes rang chas su gnas
NK031(ki)007:1923: med de / pa de / rang snang ba las
NK031(ki)007:1924: gzhan pa'i sems med pa thag chod pa bying rgod
NK031(ki)007:1925: dbyings su yal zhing 'khrul snang rang sar grol nas
NK031(ki)007:1927: spyi don gsum pa rjes kyi bya ba ni /
NK031(ki)007:1928: thog mar gtang rag gtong ste /
NK031(ki)007:1929: spyir gyi dbang bco brgyad po re re'i rjes su yang /
NK031(ki)007:1930: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi don du ci 'byor pa'i yon dngos su 'bul ba'am /
NK031(ki)007:1931: man+dala 'grem sdud byas nas yid kyis lus longs spyod thams cad dbul bar bya zhing /
NK031(ki)007:1932: skabs 'dir tshogs kyi mchod pa rgya chen po bya /
NK031(ki)007:1933: chos skyong la gtang rag gtong /
NK031(ki)007:1935: bla mar 'khor gsum yongs dag gi gtang rag gis mnyes par byas la /
NK031(ki)007:1936: slob ma rnams kyis rtogs pa 'bul zhing /
NK031(ki)007:1937: de'i lan du bla mas kyang /
NK031(ki)007:1938: sems sde spyi'i dgongs pa rin po che klong rdol glu'i bsam gtan sh+r+ai sid+hasa /
NK031(ki)007:1939: bsam gtan gyi khang par tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dus su glu blangs pa bzhin du /
NK031(ki)007:1940: rdo rje'i glu blangs par bya ste 'di skad lo //
NK031(ki)007:1942: ji ltar bsams kyang bsgom du med //
NK031(ki)007:1943: ji ltar smras kyang spyad du med //
NK031(ki)007:1944: ye shes chen po'i dbyings nyid las //
NK031(ki)007:1945: btsal ba med par 'od shar te //
NK031(ki)007:1946: bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la //
NK031(ki)007:1947: yengs pa med par mnyam par bzhag /
NK031(ki)007:1949: rig pa ye shes mdung rtse yis //
NK031(ki)007:1950: rnam rtog dgra bo rdul du rlog /
NK031(ki)007:1951: rat+na ko sa la a hoh zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so ////
NK031(ki)007:1952: de nas bum pa dang rdul tshon rnams bsdu zhing
NK031(ki)007:1953: bum chu dang rdul tshon don du gnyer ba yod
NK031(ki)007:1954: na sbyin / med na ri bo chen po'i rtse'am
NK031(ki)007:1955: chu bo chen po'i rgyun la bskyal bas rlung dang
NK031(ki)007:1956: chu rgyun phog pa'i sems can rnams 'bad med du
NK031(ki)007:1957: na sbyin / grol bar bsam / bsngo ba dang smon lam rgya chen po btab la /
NK031(ki)007:1959: zhag gcig gnas srung ba'i cho ga bya zhing /
NK031(ki)007:1960: nyams dang rtogs pa ci 'phel du bskyangs /
NK031(ki)007:1961: sems sde ma bu bco brgyad kyi dgongs pa ngo
NK031(ki)007:1962: sprad pa'i thabs rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bco brgyad
NK031(ki)007:1963: bskur ba'i chog khrigs 'di snga rabs pa 'ga' zhig
NK031(ki)007:1964: la phyag len cung zad mi 'dra ba snang yang
NK031(ki)007:1965: / rgya gar mkhas pa nyi shu rtsa gcig rim par brgyud pa'i gdams ngag dang /
NK031(ki)007:1966: lo ts+aa ba chen po bee ro tsa na'i 'dra 'bag dang /
NK031(ki)007:1967: bod kyi bla ma gong ma rnams kyi phyag bzhes kyi yi ge'i rigs rnams dang /
NK031(ki)007:1968: drin can zur mo'i phyag len rnams gung sgrigs nas
NK031(ki)007:1969: lag tu blang bde ba'i phyir sems sde'i rgyud 'grel
NK031(ki)007:1970: man ngag dang bcas pa rnams dang mi 'gal bar
NK031(ki)007:1971: bsdebs pa 'di ni bya btang gi sprang po rdo
NK031(ki)007:1973: chu bo chen po pak+shu'i gnas 'gram chos lding zhes bya ba'i ri khrod du /
NK031(ki)007:1974: mtshan ldan zhig po rin po che'i chos rgyud dri
NK031(ki)007:1975: ma med par 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ra
NK031(ki)007:1976: dung brag pas sbyin bdag bgyis nas lcags mo sbrul
NK031(ki)007:1977: gyi lo / dbyar zla tha chung gi yar ngo la yi ger btab pa'o //
NK031(ki)007:1978: 'dis sems can dpag tu med pa rtsol bral rdzogs
NK031(ki)007:1979: pa chen po'i don rtogs nas 'khrul snang rang sar
NK031(ki)007:1980: grol ba'i rkyen byed par gyur cig /
NK031(ki)007:1981: nges don mthar thug rdzogs chen gyi //
NK031(ki)007:1982: snyan brgyud zhal gyi gdams pa 'di //
NK031(ki)007:1983: yi ger bkod par mi 'os kyang //
NK031(ki)007:1984: brda don brgyud pa'i don ched du //
NK031(ki)007:1985: rton pa bzhi yi rjes 'brang nas //
NK031(ki)007:1986: rig pa'i rtsal dbang bco brgyad kyi //
NK031(ki)007:1987: ngo sprad dbang gi phyag len 'di //
NK031(ki)007:1988: lhag pa'i bsam pas yi ger bkod //
NK031(ki)007:1989: 'di la nongs pa'i tshogs mchis na //
NK031(ki)007:1990: bla ma yi dam bka' srung gis //
NK031(ki)007:1991: rang bzhin don la dgongs mdzad nas //
NK031(ki)007:1992: thugs rjes nye bar bzung bar rigs //
NK031(ki)007:1993: gal te bdag gi ngal ba 'di //
NK031(ki)007:1994: don yod srid na dge ba des //
NK031(ki)007:1995: ma lus sems can thams cad kun //
NK031(ki)007:1996: bla med byang chub thob par smon //
NK031(ki)007:1997: ma bcos rang snang rol pa dang //
NK031(ki)007:1998: 'khrul shes yul dang bcas pa dag /
NK031(ki)007:1999: bye brag ma phyed gti mug blos //
NK031(ki)007:2000: nyams dang rtogs par rloms pa dang //
NK031(ki)007:2001: mkhas pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can //
NK031(ki)007:2002: nges pa'i don la skur 'debs shing //
NK031(ki)007:2003: chos spong las kyi khur 'khur bas //
NK031(ki)007:2004: mnar med gnas su bsnyegs pa dang //
NK031(ki)007:2005: kha 'jam lta ba'i rdzong bzung nas //
NK031(ki)007:2006: bslu med rgyu 'bras khyad gsad cing //
NK031(ki)007:2007: gzu bor gnas pa'i blo bor nas //
NK031(ki)007:2008: bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa dang //
NK031(ki)007:2009: mkhas pa'i bla ma ma brten cing //
NK031(ki)007:2010: rnam dag gzhung lugs ma sbyangs pas //
NK031(ki)007:2011: gnas lugs dri med rtogs dka' yang //
NK031(ki)007:2012: mu cor smra ba'i blun po rnams //
NK031(ki)007:2013: re zhig thugs rje'i yul min yang //
NK031(ki)007:2014: rang byung rig pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK031(ki)007:2015: rtsol bral theg pa'i snod gyur nas //
NK031(ki)007:2016: yang dag don la 'jug par shog /
NK031(ki)007:2017: phyogs dang dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du /
NK031(ki)007:2018: bkra shis dang bde legs kyis khyab par gyur cig /
